title.__cdata: There is a Huge Book Sale on Amazon

encoded.__cdata:
Summertime Sale: Amazon Book Deals Await You

The Deal of the Summer

Is there anything better than lounging in the sun, reading a fantastic book? I think not. Now is an excellent time to stock up on books for the summer, because Amazon has a huge book sale running through May 20. Ebook prices start at $1, while print books are going for as low as $5. Every genre you can think of is covered in the sale, from classics to children's books to BookTok faves.

Get Your Summer Reading Ready

We've seen this deal before, but it still matches the best price we've tracked. The Kindle Scribe (8/10, WIRED Recommends) is expensive. This deal makes it a bit more accessible. It's the Best Kindle for note-taking and annotation. It's also the only Kindle that's on sale right now.Usually Kindle Unlimited trials are a month long, but right now new subscribers can try the service out for two months longer. Keep in mind that the service will automatically renew at $12 per month once the trial is up, so set a reminder to cancel if you don't want those subsequent charges. Kindle Unlimited is one of our favorite ebook subscription services. It helped me get back into reading as an adult.

Book Recommendations

Neal Stephenson named the Metaverse. How much more WIRED can you get? This classic cyberpunk tale is worth every penny. People have a lot of strong opinions about this author, but if you're curious, you can save on one of her most popular titles. This tender romance novel is being made into a movie that'll be released in August. This novel is arguably the perfect beach read. It's romantic and glamorous, with a well-rounded cast of characters and the right level of intrigue to keep you turning the pages. I devoured this book in two days. I couldn't put it down. If the thought of a badass heroine, talking dragons, a bully romance trope, and a quest to save the world gets your blood pumping, this one lives up to the hype. Books are almost always better than their movie adaptations. No shade to the wonderful Kathy Bates, but Misery is definitely one of those cases. I probably shouldn't have read it when I was 13, but I did, and I still think about it. I think it's one of King's best works. If you've already read it, Fairy Tale—a newer King novel—is also on sale for $13 ($8 off). This memoir comes highly recommended by WIRED reviewer Medea Giordano. She said it “shattered her heart into a million pieces.” I'll be buying a copy based on that recommendation alone, but if you need more convincing, just check out the thousands of 5-star reviews on Amazon. This memoir has been a New York Times bestseller for 80 weeks and counting. It explores McCurdy's life as a child actor, complete with an overbearing mother, addiction, eating disorders, and more—but it ends on a good note, with themes of resilience and self-discovery. (I'll be buying this one too). It's a Dr. Seuss board book and it's $3 and I guarantee the kids in your life will get a kick out of it (pun very much intended). They can lift the flaps and discover opposites. You can read the rhymes. It's a win-win situation. I, for one, am fully here for Snoop Dogg's culinary career. This cookbook was made in collaboration with E-40, who should need no further introduction. It contains more than 60 recipes that share a common theme—getting together with your loved ones and eating good food. Reviewer Scott Gilberton jokingly called this “light reading,” but despite its heaviness, it's still worth reading. This novel sits with you long after you put it down. It's gritty, it's poignant, and despite its heady narrative, it isn't too difficult to read. Most of all, though, it'll stick with you—I recommend having a highlighter handy.

meta_value.__cdata: There is a Huge Book Sale on Amazon

title.__cdata: Bitcoin Continues to Outstrip Ethereum in Market Dominance

encoded.__cdata:
Ether Continues to Fall Behind Bitcoin After Merge Upgrade

More than 19 months after Ethereum’s historic Merge upgrade, the data is clear: the network’s native asset, Ether (ETH), is not keeping up with Bitcoin (BTC). The ETH/BTC price ratio tapped another three-year low on Thursday at 0.044, with Ether last experiencing less market dominance against Bitcoin in May of 2021.

Why Does ETH Keep Dumping Against BTC?

The trend has been offputting and confusing for Ethereum bulls, of whom many assumed ETH would become a more appetizing investment than Bitcoin following the September 2022 Merge. At the time, the upgrade introduced a proof of stake consensus mechanism, and lowered ETH’s inflation rate by 90%. Combined with Ethereum’s previously implemented transaction fee-burning mechanics, this meant ETH was now both an investment with intrinsic yield and a negative inflation rate – bullish properties that its older brother BTC did not possess.

Despite these qualities, ETH/BTC has fallen 45% since the Merge took place. This is especially noteworthy given that crypto has been in a general bull market for the past 18 months. During such times, altcoins are accustomed to outperforming BTC.

Joe McCann, the founder of crypto fund Asymmetric, tweeted on Wednesday that “the flippening” – a dream that the market cap of ETH might one day surpass that of BTC – “was always a dream that has turned into a nightmare.” He argued that “Bitcoin is ‘ultrasound money’ and Solana is the “global supercomputer,” while Ethereum is neither.

Experts at CryptoQuant argued that Ether is no longer “ultrasound money” since its Dencun upgrade took effect in March 2024. While lowering transaction fees for users, it also turned Ether into an inflationary currency again, hurting its investment thesis as a better store of value than Bitcoin.

Recent technical breakthroughs have allowed developers to bring applications to Bitcoin that were once unique to Ethereum and other more programmable chains. These include Ordinals NFTs, Runes trading, and BitVM – a new framework for bringing smart contracts and trust-minimized layer 2 networks to the Bitcoin ecosystem. Bitcoin has already become a more popular chain for NFT trading than Ethereum.

Ethereum’s Regulatory Woes

Aside from technical concerns, Ethereum also faces major headwinds on the regulatory front. While Bitcoin spot ETF products were approved in January, experts believe any imminent approval for an Ether spot ETF remains highly unlikely. Most altcoins, including Ether, appear to be on the radar of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, prompting legal trouble against exchanges and other companies interacting with such assets.

Solana (SOL) is up 665% over the past year, compared to ETH’s 61% rise. Ether’s total crypto market dominance is now down to 15.1%, versus Bitcoin’s 54.5%, according to CoinMarketCap.

meta_value.__cdata: Bitcoin Continues to Outstrip Ethereum in Market Dominance

title.__cdata: El Salvador Introduces Tokenized Investment Opportunities on Bitcoin Sidechain

encoded.__cdata:
El Salvador Launches National Investment Opportunities Through Bitcoin Infrastructure

El Salvador made a groundbreaking move towards tokenization by introducing national investment opportunities based on Bitcoin infrastructure. The nation’s National Bitcoin Office initiated its blockchain-based capital raise on the Liquid network, marking a significant step in the country’s adoption of cryptocurrency.

Bitcoin-Based Capital Markets Launched

The launch of Bitcoin-based capital markets in El Salvador, the first country to embrace Bitcoin as legal tender, was a historic milestone. The Liquid network, a Bitcoin sidechain managed by Blockstream and a federation of 65 Bitcoin-centric companies worldwide, provides a platform for faster, cheaper, and more private transactions compared to the main Bitcoin blockchain.

Using BTC as its native asset, Liquid enables the issuance of tokens representing a variety of assets, including stablecoins like Tether (USDT), meme coins, and real-world assets and securities.

Investing in Development with Tokenized Offerings

El Salvador’s token offerings include opportunities to invest in the construction of the first hotel at El Salvador International Airport. Investors can expect a 10% annual return over a five-year period, with a minimum investment of $1000.

The hotel infrastructure will feature 80 rooms, commercial spaces, a swimming pool, restaurants, a gym, gardens, and other amenities, as stated on the Inverlag Hotels website.

Investors who contribute $1 million will receive complimentary stays at the hotel throughout the five-year bond tenure, showcasing the unique benefits of these tokenized investments.

The Role of DitoBanx and Bitfinex

The tokenized offerings in El Salvador were facilitated by the Bitcoin startup DitoBanx and the exchange platform Bitfinex. However, due to regulatory restrictions, U.S. investors are unable to participate in these investment opportunities.

El Salvador’s Progressive Approach to Bitcoin

As the first and only country to recognize Bitcoin as legal tender alongside the U.S. dollar, El Salvador continues to demonstrate its commitment to cryptocurrency adoption. Not only does the state invest in BTC, but it also operates a Bitcoin mining venture powered by geothermal energy from local volcanoes.

With a total of 474 BTC mined since 2021 and holdings of 5,750 BTC (equivalent to $378 million), El Salvador’s embrace of Bitcoin extends beyond currency integration to encompass innovative tokenized investment offerings that pave the way for future financial opportunities.

meta_value.__cdata: El Salvador Introduces Tokenized Investment Opportunities on Bitcoin Sidechain

title.__cdata: Millennium, Point72, and Elliott Participate in Buying Bitcoin ETFs

encoded.__cdata: # Wall Street Dives into Bitcoin ETFs ## Hedge Funds, Pension Funds, and Banks Invest in Bitcoin ETFs In a groundbreaking move, hedge funds, pension funds, and banks have joined the retail trading crowd in investing in Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) after their blockbuster debut that took over a decade to materialize. ### Notable Buyers in the Market Among the reputed buyers in the Bitcoin ETF market are hedge funds like Millennium Management, with holdings of around $2 billion in at least four Bitcoin ETFs. Other prominent investors include Steven Cohen’s Point72 Asset Management and Elliott Investment Management. Additionally, firms from diverse geographies like State of Wisconsin Investment Board, Bank of Montreal, and others from Hong Kong, the Cayman Islands, Puerto Rico, and Switzerland have also made investments in the ETFs. ### Snapshot into Investor Holdings Following the deadline to file first-quarter 13F reports with the US Securities and Exchange Commission, it was discovered that roughly 1,000 filers held shares in the Bitcoin ETFs. Market makers like Citadel Securities and quant-trading firm Susquehanna International Group were also among the investors. ### Purpose of Investments The reports only provide a snapshot in time, and it remains unclear why money managers were holding the ETFs. While some investors might be bullish on Bitcoin, others may have opened positions to capitalize on the cryptocurrency’s volatility or hedge their short positions in derivatives. The investments may also be part of basis trades or model-driven strategies, rather than indicative of beliefs in Bitcoin's fundamental value. ### Continued Expansion of Bitcoin ETF Interest Despite the varied reasons for investment, the trend indicates that Wall Street is increasingly venturing into the world of digital assets through Bitcoin ETFs. Professional investors are taking small personal allocations before committing on behalf of their clients as they test the waters of this market. The demand for Bitcoin ETFs has seen record inflows, with market participants closely monitoring the money flow into these funds as they continue to break records. The reasons behind these purchases may vary, but the interest in Bitcoin ETFs is undeniably clear. Whether viewed as a diversifier or a hedge against inflation, Bitcoin continues to attract a wide range of investors looking to capitalize on the digital asset's potential.

meta_value.__cdata: Millennium, Point72, and Elliott Participate in Buying Bitcoin ETFs

title.__cdata: Understanding the Functionality of Google's AI Summaries and Why You Cannot Disable Them

encoded.__cdata: # Google's AI Overviews: A New Feature in Search Results ## What Triggers AI-generated Summaries? Google's AI Overviews appear in search results for complex queries, according to Mallory De Leon, a Google spokesperson. The AI Overviews are designed to provide quick information from a range of sources, making them especially helpful for users. During initial tests, the AI Overviews seemed to appear randomly for both simple and more complicated questions. ## The Power Behind AI Overviews De Leon explains that the AI Overview feature is powered by Google's customized Gemini model, supplemented with elements from the company's Search system, such as the Knowledge Graph, containing billions of general facts. For some AI Overview answers, the webpage links are immediately visible, while for others, users need to click "Show more" to see the information sources. ## Concerns About Accuracy One concern about the AI Overview feature is the potential for AI hallucinations or inaccuracies. While Google's Gemini chatbot comes with a disclaimer warning about potentially inaccurate information, the AI Overviews simply state that generative AI is experimental. This lack of a disclaimer about potential inaccuracies in AI Overviews raises concerns about the reliability of the information presented. When questioned about the absence of a disclaimer for AI Overviews, De Leon emphasizes that Google conducted adversarial red-teaming tests to ensure the feature's quality and safety systems. She assures that the AI Overviews are designed to highlight easily verifiable information. ## The Future of AI Overviews Google's head of Search, Liz Reid, mentioned that AI Overviews are expected to roll out in countries outside the United States by the end of 2024, impacting over a billion users. This new feature has raised apprehensions among publishers and users alike, as it may lead to less trustworthy results and affect traditional search habits. Despite the potential time-saving benefits of AI Overviews, users are encouraged to verify information by clicking through the provided webpage links. The introduction of AI-generated summaries in search results signifies a significant shift in how users interact with information online, raising questions about the reliability and implications of such technology.

meta_value.__cdata: Understanding the Functionality of Google's AI Summaries and Why You Cannot Disable Them

title.__cdata: Cardano Whales Increase Holdings by 11% in One Month as ADA Targets $0.5

encoded.__cdata:
Cardano Whales Increase ADA Holdings

Cardano, like the rest of the cryptocurrency market, experienced a lackluster month recently. However, a specific group of high-profile investors has been quietly accumulating significant amounts of ADA tokens. These "whales," who hold between 100 million and 1 billion ADA, have increased their balances by 11% in the past month, according to ITB's latest findings.

This surge indicates a growing confidence or strategic positioning among large ADA holders. Currently, this group of ADA investors holds 6.71% of the entire token supply, showcasing their substantial influence within the Cardano ecosystem.

Market Activity and Price Analysis

There has been a gradual increase in Cardano whale activity over recent weeks. Typically, such spikes in whale activity precede potential price reversals, indicating shifts in market sentiment. Surprisingly, ADA has closely followed the broader market movement, showing a modest recovery with a nearly 6% surge in the past 24 hours, reaching $0.456 at the time of writing.

Experts foresee a bullish outlook for ADA, with predictions suggesting a potential surge to $7.80 and even reaching a "parabolic" peak of $10. Additionally, speculation about Gemini listing ADA has fueled optimism for a significant price rally if the US-based exchange decides to support the token.

Cardano's User Activity Declines

Despite positive price projections, user activity on the Cardano network has been dwindling since March this year. Data from Artemis reveals that daily transactions on the network have significantly decreased to around 50.7k compared to nearly 96k recorded two months ago. Similarly, daily active addresses have also dropped below 24k this month, raising concerns about the network's current adoption rates and usage.

These declines in user activity contrast with the optimistic sentiment surrounding Cardano's price potential, indicating a divergence between market speculation and on-chain metrics.

title.__cdata: Bitcoin reaches $66,000 following crypto surge triggered by mild inflation data

encoded.__cdata:
Bitcoin Surges Past $66,000 as Crypto Markets Rally

BTC Hits Highest Price Since April

Bitcoin (BTC) climbed to its highest price since April 24, surging past $66,000 for the first time in weeks. The cryptocurrency was up more than 7% over the past 24 hours, with analysts suggesting that it could target the $84,000 level in the near future.

Altcoins Leading Gains

While Bitcoin led the way, altcoins such as Solana (SOL) and NEAR also saw significant gains. Solana and NEAR both jumped 8% and 12% respectively, outperforming the broader market benchmark CoinDesk 20 Index, which was up 6%.

Market Rally Triggered by U.S. Inflation Data

The rally in the crypto markets was triggered by softer-than-expected U.S. inflation data released on Wednesday. April's Consumer Price Index (CPI) figures edged lower from March, easing concerns about reaccelerating inflation and a potential shift in Federal Reserve policy.

Investor Confidence Boosted by Data Releases

Investors viewed the CPI data as a bullish sign, marking the first decrease in inflation over the last three months. Combined with the Federal Reserve's announcement of its intention to taper the balance sheet run-off, the data was seen as favorable for risk assets.

Bitcoin Breaks Downtrend, Eyes New All-Time Highs

Analysts at Swissblock noted that Bitcoin's surge marked a break-out from a downtrend that had capped prices for weeks. The firm suggested that BTC could rally to $69,000 in the short term, with the potential to reach new all-time highs targeting the $84,000 level.

Traditional Markets Also See Gains

In addition to the crypto rally, U.S. equities also climbed with the S&P 500 index hitting a fresh all-time high. The return of risk appetite in traditional markets further fueled optimism among investors. In conclusion, the latest surge in Bitcoin and the broader crypto markets has ignited investor enthusiasm, with analysts predicting further upside potential for both BTC and altcoins in the coming days.

meta_value.__cdata: Bitcoin reaches $66,000 following crypto surge triggered by mild inflation data

title.__cdata: IBKR Introduces Crypto Trading Option for UK Customers

encoded.__cdata:
Interactive Brokers Group Launches Crypto Trading in the U.K.

Expansion of Digital Asset Exposure

Interactive Brokers Group, Inc. (IBKR) has now launched cryptocurrency trading in the U.K. after becoming the first SFC-licensed securities broker to allow retail clients to trade cryptocurrencies in Hong Kong. With this move, the investment broker is expanding its scope of digital asset exposure.

Unified Platform for Trading

Individual and institutional investor clients of Interactive Brokers (U.K.) Limited can now trade crypto assets, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and Bitcoin Cash, from a single unified platform. Eligible clients can transact and view balances through a platform that provides a unified view of their securities brokerage account and crypto account at Paxos Trust Company.

Competitive Pricing and Convenience

Notably, commissions for cryptocurrency trades for IBKR’s U.K. clients are only 0.12-0.18% of the trade value, with a minimum of $1.75 per order. Clients are not charged any additional spreads, markups, or custody fees. The introduction of cryptocurrency trading allows clients to benefit from centralized cash management and trade various digital assets, along with stocks, options, futures, currencies, bonds, mutual funds, ETFs, etc., from a single screen.

Enhanced Flexibility for UK Clients

Gerald Perez, the CEO at Interactive Brokers U.K., stated, “Interactive Brokers offers a wide selection of global investment products, sophisticated technology, and competitive pricing. Introducing cryptocurrency trading gives UK clients enhanced flexibility to invest across markets and asset classes while also adding exposure to digital assets.”

Current State of Cryptocurrency Trading in the U.K.

Market Overview and Regulatory Changes

In contrast to Interactive Brokers’ expansion, other firms like JPMorgan’s retail bank, Chase, in the U.K., have decided to restrict customers’ access to cryptocurrency-related transactions due to increased scam and fraud cases. This move comes amid regulatory changes in the U.K., where marketing for crypto assets is now required to be clear, fair, and labeled with prominent risk warnings. Despite the challenges, the demand for cryptocurrencies continues to grow, prompting financial institutions like Interactive Brokers to offer new avenues for digital asset trading.

Global Expansion in the Crypto Market

The expansion of cryptocurrency trading by Interactive Brokers in the U.K. comes at a time when other firms like Robinhood Markets, Inc. are also planning to enter the European Union market. As the industry evolves and regulations change, financial institutions are adapting to meet the demands of investors seeking exposure to digital assets. Through strategic moves and competitive offerings, companies like Interactive Brokers aim to capture a larger market share and provide clients with enhanced investment opportunities.

meta_value.__cdata: IBKR Introduces Crypto Trading Option for UK Customers

QCP Capital has predicted a bullish momentum for bitcoin that could potentially lead to the cryptocurrency reaching its previous highs of $74,000 in the coming months. This forecast comes in the wake of a price surge experienced by BTC on May 15th, driven by increasing ETF inflows and the April Consumer Price Index (CPI) report showing a slight decline in inflation compared to the previous month.

The firm anticipates a continuation of this bullish momentum that could propel bitcoin back to its peak of $74,000. Moreover, major asset managers like Millenium and Schonfeld have started allocating around 3% and 2% of their assets under management (AUM) to spot Bitcoin ETFs, indicating a growing institutional adoption of the primary cryptocurrency. Analysts at QCP Capital attribute these positive developments to factors such as sovereign and institutional adoption, easing inflationary pressures, and the anticipation surrounding upcoming U.S. elections, all contributing to the potential resurgence of a bull market.

QCP Capital has recommended traders to consider strategies like the Bullish ERKO Seagulls, designed to leverage upward price movements while managing downside risks effectively. These strategies represent a low-cost way for investors to participate in bitcoin’s potential bull run. For instance, the June Seagull offers a cost-neutral approach with a maximum payout of $18,000 per BTC if the spot price remains below $88,000 at expiry.

Bitcoin Surges on Inflation Data

This surge marked BTC’s strongest performance since March 25 and also saw the cryptocurrency surpass its 50-day moving average for the first time since April 13.

title.__cdata: French Watchdog Warns Investors About Crypto Exchange Bybit

encoded.__cdata: # French Regulator Warns Against Bybit Crypto Exchange ## Bybit Operating Illegally in France In a recent notice issued on Thursday, the Autorité des Marchés Financiers (AMF) in France has renewed its warning against the crypto exchange Bybit. The regulator has urged customers to prepare for the possibility that Bybit may suddenly cease to provide services to customers in France. The AMF has highlighted that Bybit is not registered as a digital asset service provider (DASP) and is therefore operating illegally in the country. Bybit has been blacklisted by the AMF since May 20, 2022, for its unauthorized activities. ## Potential Legal Action and Advice for Retail Investors The notice from the AMF also suggests a potential enforcement action against Bybit. The regulator has indicated that it reserves the right, under the terms of the Monetary and Financial Code, to take legal action to block Bybit's website. Additionally, the AMF has advised retail investors to take all necessary measures to avoid any potential loss of access to their assets in case Bybit halts its services in France. ## Past Warnings and Regulatory Scrutiny This warning from the French regulator follows a similar alert issued by Hong Kong's financial regulator earlier this year. In March, the Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) in Hong Kong warned the public about Bybit, adding the exchange to its list of suspicious crypto exchanges. Bybit has faced regulatory challenges in other jurisdictions as well. Last year, the exchange withdrew from both Canada and the United Kingdom citing regulatory pressure. Bybit has not responded to requests for comment from CoinDesk at the time of publication. It remains to be seen how the situation will unfold for Bybit in France and whether the exchange will face any further regulatory actions in the country. Retail investors are advised to exercise caution and consider alternative options for their crypto trading activities in light of these developments.

meta_value.__cdata: French Watchdog Warns Investors About Crypto Exchange Bybit

title.__cdata: Peaq partners with Mastercard Start Path program, integrates DePIN with traditional finance.

encoded.__cdata:
Peaq Joins Mastercard Start Path Program

Peaq, a layer 1 blockchain, has recently announced its participation in the Mastercard Start Path program. This program, created by the payment giant Mastercard, aims to support advanced-stage projects in the fintech and web3 verticals.

Exploring New Opportunities

Peaq, known for its decentralized physical infrastructure networks (DePIN) and machine real-world-assets (RWAs), will now have the chance to collaborate with Mastercard to explore promising implementations that bridge the DePIN sector with traditional finance and fintech. Through this program, peaq is expected to expand its ecosystem, secure strategic partnerships, build communities, and raise funds.

Mastercard's Commitment to Innovation

Sabrina Tharani, SVP of Global Fintech Programs at Mastercard, expressed the company's commitment to supporting and innovating with startups in the blockchain and digital assets space. By joining the Start Path startup engagement program, Mastercard has welcomed peaq along with other startups like Kulipa Inc., Parfin, Triangle Digital, and Venly.

Tharani stated, "This dynamic set of startups will receive access to our network of partners, including mentorship opportunities and resources to support them to scale their solutions and reach new markets."

Integrating Traditional Finance

Peaq's collaboration with Mastercard is set to enhance the convenience of DePIN by enabling use cases like assigning compliant payment methods to electric vehicles and facilitating offline payments for charging sessions. Till Wendler, co-founder of peaq, highlighted that this partnership with Mastercard will allow seamless interactions between DePINs and traditional financial services, opening the door for millions of web2 users to transition towards DePINs.

Overall, peaq's participation in the Mastercard Start Path program marks a significant milestone in the integration of blockchain technology with traditional finance, promising new opportunities for innovation and growth in the fintech sector.

title.__cdata: Custody Solutions for Financial Advisors in the Crypto Space

encoded.__cdata: **Financial Advisors Facing Challenges with Crypto Custody** In the ever-evolving world of cryptocurrency, understanding the various custody options available is crucial for financial advisors. They must carefully navigate the storage, security, and accessibility of digital assets to optimize client portfolios. **The Ultimate Control with Self-Custody** For those seeking complete control over their digital assets, self-custody is the way to go. This approach involves securing private keys through cold storage, offering maximum security but requiring technical expertise. It is ideal for individuals prioritizing absolute control over their assets. **Convenience with On-Exchange Custody** On-exchange custody offers convenience and accessibility, allowing for swift transactions. However, it comes with security risks, as the platform's vulnerabilities can pose a threat. The collapse of FTX serves as a reminder of the importance of selecting platforms with strong security protocols and regulatory compliance. **Institutional Assurance with Off-Exchange Solutions** Off-exchange custody solutions provide additional verification layers, catering to the needs of institutional investors. This strategic approach combines old-world banking safety with new-tech efficiency, offering a secure way to manage substantial assets. **Exploring Crypto Quant Funds** Venturing into crypto quant funds presents a compelling opportunity, utilizing algorithms for high-frequency trading and market-neutral strategies. This method allows for diversified exposure to cryptocurrencies while minimizing risks associated with asset management and custody. **Navigating Regulatory Frameworks** Advisors must also navigate the complex regulatory landscape governing digital assets, balancing compliance with strategic innovation. The political and technological nuances require a careful approach to ensure regulatory compliance while fostering innovation. **Conclusion** Integrating cryptocurrencies into investment portfolios requires knowledge, strategic acumen, and an understanding of risk. Whether choosing self-custody, on-exchange custody, or off-exchange solutions, advisors must leverage these tools to achieve superior outcomes. The key lies in embracing bold, strategic innovation to optimize client portfolios in the volatile world of digital assets. **Ask an Expert** In a Q&A session, credit fund managers discuss the challenges and considerations when selecting custodians for bitcoin collateral assets. They prioritize minimizing business risks, ensuring long-term viability and safety. **Experts' Insights** Credit managers handling bitcoin collateral explain the unique challenges of bitcoin custody and the importance of robust security protocols. They also address the possibility of insuring bitcoin assets and the reliance on security measures rather than standard insurance policies. In conclusion, financial advisors must stay informed and adapt to the dynamic landscape of cryptocurrency custody to protect and optimize client portfolios effectively.

title.__cdata: Prevent Brain-Eating Worms and Mercury Poisoning with These Tips

encoded.__cdata: # Study Shows Link Between Fish Consumption and Mercury Exposure ## Mercury Exposure and Health Risks Recent studies have shown that almost all individuals have trace amounts of methylmercury, a form of mercury, in their bodies. This is primarily due to the prevalence of mercury in the environment. While most people have levels too low to cause health issues, excessive exposure to mercury can lead to serious health risks. Research indicates that excessive mercury exposure can result in neurodevelopmental problems in children and increase the risk of cardiovascular disease in adults. The source of this exposure is often through the consumption of fish, as fish tend to accumulate contaminants like mercury from industrial discharges in aquatic environments. ## Recommended Limits and Safety Measures To mitigate the risks associated with mercury exposure, experts recommend certain limits on fish consumption. Pregnant women are advised to avoid shark, swordfish, mackerel, and tilefish, as these species may contain higher levels of mercury that could impact fetal brain development. For the general population, it is advised to consume no more than 170 grams of fish such as tuna or mackerel per week, and a total of 350 grams of any fish or shellfish per week. Exceeding these limits on a regular basis can increase the likelihood of elevated mercury levels in the body. ## Controversy and Considerations While limiting fish intake can reduce mercury exposure, it also raises concerns about missing out on the health benefits associated with consuming fish, such as omega-3 fatty acids that protect against cardiovascular disease. The impact of mercury toxicity can vary based on individual genetic makeup and metabolism of toxic substances. Mercury poisoning can manifest through symptoms like joint and muscle pain, weakness, fatigue, insomnia, and excessive sweating. Treatment for mercury poisoning involves medications known as chelators, which help remove mercury from the body, although this process can be time-consuming. ## Conclusion In conclusion, while fish consumption can provide essential nutrients, it is crucial to be mindful of potential mercury exposure. By following recommended guidelines and monitoring fish intake, individuals can strike a balance between reaping the benefits of fish consumption and reducing the risks associated with mercury toxicity.

meta_value.__cdata: Prevent Brain-Eating Worms and Mercury Poisoning with These Tips

title.__cdata: Why Solana (SOL) Price Surged Above $160: Three Key Factors

encoded.__cdata:
Solana's Surge in Price

Solana's native token, SOL, experienced a significant surge in price within a 24-hour period. Currently valued at $161, SOL had touched $165 earlier in the day. The token saw a remarkable 56.6% increase in trading volume, reaching $3.7 billion. According to CoinGecko data, SOL holds the position of the fifth-largest cryptocurrency with a market cap of $73.1 billion.

Robinhood and Infinex's Support for Solana

This surge in SOL's price can be attributed to recent developments involving major platforms like Robinhood, Infinex, and MarginFi. Robinhood Crypto, a digital asset trading platform, announced on May 15 that they would launch a Solana-staking feature for European users. This move was communicated through a statement on Solana's official X account. Meanwhile, Infinex, a decentralized perpetual contract trading platform by Synthetix, also declared its support for Solana. The integration of Solana into the Infinex platform has opened up new opportunities for users, with a significant amount of USDC locked in Solana on the platform.

Marginfi's Liquidity Layer Announcement

On the same day, Marginfi revealed Solana's first Liquidity Layer, described as a new layer for performant DeFi. This Liquidity Layer offers integrated native yields, including staking yield through LST, token yield through mrgnlend, and stablecoin yield through YBX. The overall surge in SOL's price aligns with the broader gains across the crypto market, which has seen a 4.7% increase in the last day, reaching a total market capitalization of $2.5 trillion. Bitcoin (BTC) is currently trading at $66,000 with a 5.7% increase, while Ethereum (ETH) has experienced a 3.3% increase, now trading around $3,000. title.__cdata: Bitcoin reaches highest point in 3 weeks following release of inflation data and ETFs submitting initial 13F filings.

encoded.__cdata:
Bitcoin Price Surges to $66,000 Amid Better-Than-Expected Inflation Data

Rising Prices and Economic Indicators

In reaction to better-than-expected inflation data, the price of Bitcoin has surged to $66,000, marking the highest value since April 24, according to CoinGecko. The latest Consumer Price Index (CPI), released by the Bureau of Labor Statistics, showed a 0.3% increase in inflation, surpassing analyst expectations. Economists surveyed by Reuters had predicted a 0.4% gain in the CPI, in line with previous months. Year-over-year, the CPI climbed by 3.4%, slightly lower than the prior month's 3.5% increase.

The Impact of CPI on Bitcoin Prices

The CPI has been a significant factor influencing Bitcoin prices in recent months, according to Teddy Fusaro, president of Bitwise Asset Management. Traders closely monitor the CPI as a lower inflation rate could signal looser monetary policy from the Federal Reserve. This perceived positive outcome drives Bitcoin investors to view the cryptocurrency favorably, considering its volatile nature as a high-risk asset. David Lawant, head of research at FalconX, emphasizes the strong correlation between Bitcoin and the S&P 500 Index as a result of the CPI's influence.

Market Forces Driving Bitcoin's Uptick

The publication of 13F filings for U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs on Wednesday also played a role in boosting Bitcoin prices. These filings revealed that 937 professional firms were invested in Bitcoin ETFs as of March 31, with a total exposure of $11.06 billion. The increasing institutional interest in Bitcoin signifies a shift towards greater acceptance and adoption of the cryptocurrency among traditional investors. Furthermore, a significant Bitcoin withdrawal of over $1 billion from Coinbase on Wednesday sparked interest in the market. The recipient of the 16,021 tokens remains unknown, although analysts from CryptoQuant suggest it was an institutional player behind the transaction. In conclusion, the convergence of positive economic indicators, institutional investment, and market dynamics has propelled Bitcoin to a three-week high. As Bitcoin continues to gain traction among institutional investors, its value and prominence in the financial landscape are expected to grow further.

meta_value.__cdata: Bitcoin reaches highest point in 3 weeks following release of inflation data and ETFs submitting initial 13F filings.

title.__cdata: Tornado Cash Developer Verdict Sparks Outrage in Crypto Community

encoded.__cdata: ## Developer of Anonymizing Tool Tornado Cash Sentenced to 64 Months in Prison ### Shocking Verdict As the verdict was announced for 31-year-old Russian developer, Alexey Pertsev, outside the s-Hertogenbosch courthouse in the Netherlands, spectators were left dumbfounded. Pertsev, the co-developer of Tornado Cash, was found guilty of money laundering and was sentenced to serve 64 months in prison. The crypto community expressed outrage at the decision, with many taking to social media platforms to voice their concerns. Individuals such as Pablo Sabbatella and Alexandre Stachtchenko criticized the ruling, calling it a sad day for privacy and crypto. ### Split Reactions While some in the crypto community saw the decision as a necessary step towards ensuring trust in the industry, others viewed it as an overreach by regulators. With global efforts to combat money laundering in the crypto space, the verdict against Pertsev highlighted the challenges faced by developers and users of anonymizing tools like Tornado Cash. The platform has been associated with criminal activities, including hacks and thefts by groups like Lazarus. ### Legal and Regulatory Perspectives The Dutch judge argued that Tornado Cash facilitated money laundering transactions, leading to Pertsev's conviction. The verdict raised concerns about compliance and regulatory issues associated with such tools. Despite the guilty verdict, some legal experts contended that a more nuanced approach is needed when addressing crimes involving decentralized technologies. The impact of Pertsev's case could extend to other developers associated with Tornado Cash, such as Roman Storm and Roman Semenov, who are facing similar charges in the U.S. ### The Road Ahead As Pertsev explores options for appealing the court's decision, the outcome of his case could set a precedent for future trials related to anonymizing tools in the crypto space. With the debate over privacy, individualism, and regulatory oversight intensifying, the legal landscape for crypto developers remains uncertain. The crypto community waits to see how Pertsev's appeal unfolds and what implications it could have for the broader industry.

meta_value.__cdata: Tornado Cash Developer Verdict Sparks Outrage in Crypto Community

title.__cdata: High-ranking FBI Official Encourages Agents to Utilize Warrantless Wiretapping Within the United States

encoded.__cdata:
FBI Encourages Surveillance of Americans

Controversy Surrounds Section 702 Program

A top FBI official, deputy director Paul Abbate, has been encouraging employees to continue investigating Americans using a warrantless foreign surveillance program known as Section 702. This internal email obtained by WIRED raises concerns about the justification of the bureau’s spy powers. The program, controversial for its past misuse by the FBI to target US protesters, journalists, and even a sitting member of Congress, was recently extended by US lawmakers for an additional two years in April. Despite this extension, concerns about the abuse of power linger.

FBI's Push for Surveillance

In the April 20 email, Abbate urged employees to use tools like the Section 702 program to demonstrate their essentiality to the mission, while ensuring compliance with legal requirements. Representative Zoe Lofgren from California expressed concern over the FBI's apparent push for more surveillance of Americans, contradicting earlier assurances from the bureau during the program's reauthorization debate. Following the publication of the internal email, the FBI spokesperson Susan McKee provided a statement defending the bureau's actions and emphasizing the importance of FISA Section 702 in protecting the American people.

Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act (FISA) 702 Program

Under the FISA 702 program, the government can use American companies to eavesdrop on various communications without the need for a search warrant. However, at least one recipient must be a foreigner believed to be outside of the US. The FBI director Christopher Wray has emphasized the bureau's focus on reducing the number of searches of the 702 database for information on Americans. The frequency of such searches remains unclear, with varying numbers reported over the years.

Compliance and Concerns

A review by the Justice Department found that the FBI's compliance rate with the program was around 98 percent. However, concerns remain about noncompliant searches and the lack of clarity on the exact number of queries conducted. Despite criticism from privacy advocates, the US House Intelligence Committee celebrated the extension of the Section 702 surveillance program. This event highlights ongoing debates and concerns about the surveillance of Americans under such programs.

meta_value.__cdata: High-ranking FBI Official Encourages Agents to Utilize Warrantless Wiretapping Within the United States

title.__cdata: What caused Coinbase's (COIN) shares to drop by 9.5% on Thursday?

encoded.__cdata:
Coinbase Faces Pressure as Competition Rises

Coinbase, the leading crypto player in the US, saw a surge in its shares earlier this year as it became the chosen platform for custodian services by ETF providers like BlackRock. This decision, coupled with the overall bullish market momentum, propelled its shares to over $250. However, recent developments have seen a significant drop in COIN's value, possibly due to increasing competition in the local market.

Monopoly in ETF Custodian Services

With Brian Armstrong at the helm, Coinbase has established itself as a monopoly in the Bitcoin ETF custodian sector, largely because it is among the few publicly-traded crypto exchanges in the US. This strategic advantage paid off during the first quarter of 2024 when the ETFs were launched, leading to a 72% surge in revenue, exceeding expectations.

Price Movements and Decline

Following the positive developments, Coinbase's shares soared from $156 at the beginning of the year to a peak of $280 in late March. However, as the market retraced in April and May, the shares maintained a level above $200. The recent slump, dropping by 9.43% from $215 to $199, suggests external factors influencing the decline rather than market movements.

It is speculated that increased competition in the spot trading arena within the US market is a significant factor. CME Group, a prominent player in futures trading, announced plans to introduce spot BTC trading, posing a potential threat to established platforms like Coinbase and Binance. Additionally, Ark Invest, led by Cathie Wood, has been gradually selling off COIN shares, adding to the selling pressure.

While the broader crypto market, led by BTC reaching a new all-time high, remains bullish, Coinbase's recent struggles highlight the challenges of maintaining dominance in a rapidly evolving industry. With emerging competitors and shifting investor sentiments, the coming months will be critical for Coinbase as it navigates this new landscape.

meta_value.__cdata: What caused Coinbase's (COIN) shares to drop by 9.5% on Thursday?

title.__cdata: What does Restaking involve?

encoded.__cdata: ## Restaking: A Revolutionary Approach to Utilizing Staked Cryptocurrency ### Introduction to Restaking In the rapidly evolving world of blockchain technology, new mechanisms and protocols are continuously being developed to enhance the efficiency and security of existing and future crypto projects. One such innovative mechanism is restaking, which allows users to utilize their staked cryptocurrency across multiple protocols simultaneously. This not only boosts reward potential but also significantly enhances the security and scalability of blockchain networks, benefiting the entire crypto ecosystem. ### Staking and Proof-of-Stake To understand restaking, it's crucial to first understand the concept of staking within the context of proof-of-stake (PoS) blockchain networks. PoS is a method used to keep blockchain networks safe and ensure that transactions are correct. Validators (or stakers) lock up a certain amount of cryptocurrency to secure the network and participate in block creation and validation processes. This staked cryptocurrency acts as collateral to ensure validators act in the network's best interest. ### What is Restaking? Restaking allows validators to redeploy their staked cryptocurrency across multiple PoS-based services simultaneously. This means that the same staked assets can secure multiple platforms, extending their utility and potential rewards. Restaking addresses limitations of traditional staking such as limited reward generation and shared network security. ### Types of Restaking Restaking can be categorized into two types: native restaking and liquid restaking. Users can engage in native restaking if they operate their own validator, while liquid restaking involves using Liquid Staking Tokens (LSTs) to participate in restaking platforms conveniently. ### How Restaking Works In both native and liquid restaking, the core idea is to maximize the use of staked assets by securing multiple protocols simultaneously. Validators earn additional rewards by participating in restaking, either through native restaking where they run their validator node or liquid restaking where they use liquid staking tokens. ### Advantages of Restaking Restaking offers increased flexibility, enhanced reward potential, scalable security, and improved security for new protocols. It allows validators to access liquidity while maintaining the potential for rewards, generate multiple streams of income, and scale network security based on demand. ### Disadvantages and Risks of Restaking While restaking presents numerous advantages, it also comes with risks such as centralization risk, compounded slashing risk, smart contract vulnerabilities, and counterparty risk. Validators must be aware of these risks before engaging in restaking activities. ### Examples of Restaking Protocols EigenLayer on Ethereum is a prominent example of a restaking protocol. Other restaking protocols in early development include Picasso on Solana and Octopus 2.0 on Near. ### The Next Steps for Restaking Restaking addresses key limitations in the traditional staking model and offers a groundbreaking way for users to maximize their staked cryptocurrency across various protocols simultaneously. With the potential for increased rewards and enhanced security, restaking is set to revolutionize the way we interact with blockchain networks in the crypto ecosystem.

title.__cdata: Bitcoin Derivatives Traders Predict Short-Term Correction in BTC Despite Lower Inflation

encoded.__cdata:
Bitcoin Derivatives Traders Anticipate Short-Term Correction Despite Soft Inflation

Premium for Downside Protection

CF Benchmarks' analysis of Bitcoin (BTC) futures options on the Chicago Mercantile Exchange (CME) indicates that investors are willing to pay a premium for short-term downside protection, even after the recent softer U.S. Consumer Price Index (CPI) inflation report. Despite Bitcoin's surge above $66,000 post-inflation data release, there is a higher implied volatility for out-of-the-money (OTM) put options compared to calls, signaling a bearish short-term sentiment among derivatives traders.

Optimistic Long-Term View

While the short-term outlook seems bearish, analysts observe a "flatter" volatility curve for longer-dated puts and calls, slightly skewed towards calls, suggesting a more positive long-term outlook for Bitcoin. The analysts speculate that the skew towards calls may increase in the event of expectations of disinflation acceleration post the favorable CPI report.

CME Group Contemplates Launching Bitcoin Spot Trading

Potential Expansion

According to reports from the Financial Times, the CME Group is reportedly considering the introduction of Bitcoin spot trading alongside its existing futures products. This move aims to cater to traders seeking a regulated platform for cryptocurrency trading. The addition of spot trading on CME would enable traders to profit from basis trades by exploiting price disparities between futures contracts and the spot price of the underlying asset. However, the finalization of this plan is still pending. Overall, the derivatives market reveals a cautious short-term approach towards Bitcoin, with traders hedging against potential value decline. On the other hand, the possibility of CME expanding into spot trading reflects growing interest and demand for regulated cryptocurrency trading platforms among investors. The dynamics of the Bitcoin market continue to evolve, influenced by both economic indicators and innovations within the financial sector.

title.__cdata: College Campus Protests Exploited by Russian Influence Campaign

encoded.__cdata: # Russia and Other Foreign Actors Amplifying Disinformation Around US Campus Protests ## Covert Doppelganger Campaign Echoes Russian Narratives The covert Doppelganger campaign, believed to be originating from Russia, has been spreading disinformation around the ongoing campus protests in the United States. The disinformation campaign echoed narratives promoted by overt Russian channels, such as Telegram groups and state-run media outlets. These channels have been highlighting the "threat of deadly police violence against demonstrators" and connecting the current protests to the Kent State protests in 1970 when four students were shot and killed by the National Guard. ## Amplification on Social Media Platforms On Facebook, Sputnik, a Russian state media outlet, wrote about how US lawmakers are restricting students' rights to peaceful protest, citing their crack down on student protests against the violence in the Gaza Strip. Similarly, on Telegram, Russian influencers with substantial followings have been amplifying content related to the protests. One military blogger with over 800,000 followers posted videos showing police presence on campuses across the US, misleadingly claiming it showed "urban warfare training." ## Coordination and Narrative The channels on Telegram seem to coordinate around a narrative that accuses the US government of hypocrisy when it comes to freedom of protest and organization. This analysis was shared with WIRED by Logically, a company that specializes in tracking disinformation campaigns. The disinformation campaign is believed to be using the 2024 US election as a focal point for spreading their false narratives. ## Collaboration with Other Countries Russia is not the only foreign actor involved in spreading disinformation about the protests. China and Iran have also been active in producing articles in English to shape the narrative around the protests. State media from these countries have collectively generated nearly 400 articles in just two weeks. Additionally, the three governments have been using social media platforms to boost their narratives about the protests. ## US-Based Far-Right Figures Involved While foreign actors continue to spread disinformation, US-based far-right figures have also played a role in amplifying conspiracies about the protests. Some of these conspiracies involve accusations of funding from figures like George Soros. However, Russia is now taking advantage of these preexisting theories and expanding them for their own agenda, including supporting Trump and criticizing Biden. In conclusion, the ongoing campus protests in the US have become a battleground for information warfare, with foreign actors and domestic figures alike shaping the narrative to suit their interests.

meta_value.__cdata: College Campus Protests Exploited by Russian Influence Campaign

title.__cdata: University of Zurich partners with BNB Chain to offer Blockchain Education Program

encoded.__cdata:
BNB Chain Supports Web3 Education at University of Zurich

[PRESS RELEASE – Dubai, UAE, May 16th, 2024]

Collaboration with University of Zurich

BNB Chain, a community-driven blockchain ecosystem, has reaffirmed its commitment to Web3 education by sponsoring the international summer school at the University of Zurich for the third consecutive year. The collaboration aims to provide funding for students worldwide to study at the Blockchain Center of the University of Zurich, known as one of the top three universities globally for blockchain education.

As the main sponsor of the "Deep Dive into Blockchain Summer School," BNB Chain is enabling students to immerse themselves in the blockchain world and learn from experts in the field. The funding support from BNB Chain allows students from diverse backgrounds to travel to the university and participate in a program designed to equip them with the skills necessary for building in blockchain technology.

Empowering Future Blockchain Builders

By sponsoring the International Summer School at the University of Zurich, BNB Chain is demonstrating its commitment to supporting a new generation of blockchain builders. The sponsorship provides opportunities for students who may not have the financial means to attend such programs, enabling a more inclusive and diverse participation in the blockchain industry.

BNB Chain's involvement in the program includes lecture sessions, hands-on activities, mentorship, and feedback sessions. Students will be challenged to develop innovative solutions on the BNB Chain network, with the opportunity to receive an NFT certificate upon completion of the program. This certificate serves as a recognition of their acquired knowledge and can potentially open doors to new opportunities in the blockchain sector.

Building Web3 Talent

BNB Chain's collaboration with the University of Zurich is part of a broader initiative to develop Web3 talent and support builders in the blockchain industry. The organization offers various support programs, including the Most Valuable Builder (MVB) program, grants, developer education programs, and workshops with educational institutions worldwide.

With its flagship blockchain opBNB ranking as the top blockchain by daily active users and the BNB Smart Chain leading as the number one L1 blockchain by DAU, BNB Chain has established itself as a prominent community-driven blockchain ecosystem. The collaboration with the University of Zurich further cements BNB Chain's position as a key player in fostering blockchain talent and innovation.

About BNB Chain

BNB Chain is a community-driven blockchain ecosystem that aims to remove barriers to Web3 adoption. It consists of BNB Smart Chain (BSC), opBNB, and BNB Greenfield, offering secure DeFi services, scalability, and decentralized storage solutions.

The AvengerDAO and Red Alarm within the ecosystem provide security and risk-scanning services for users and developers. BNB Chain also offers a Builder Support Program to empower individuals in Web3 development and blockchain technology.

About The University of Zurich Blockchain Center

The University of Zurich Blockchain Center is a leading academic initiative dedicated to interdisciplinary research and education in blockchain technology. The center acts as a bridge between academia, industry, and policymakers, fostering a deep understanding of distributed trust systems.

title.__cdata: Hill sources anticipate Senate will reverse SAB 121 in upcoming Thursday vote.

encoded.__cdata:
Senate to Vote on Resolution to Invalidate SEC Accounting Bulletin

Sources Predict Democrat Support for Joint Resolution 109

The US Senate is set to vote on Joint Resolution 109 on Thursday, with sources indicating that there is a belief it will garner enough Democrat support to pass. The resolution, which cleared the House of Representatives last week with bipartisan backing, seeks to overturn the Security and Exchange Commission’s contentious Staff Accounting Bulletin (SAB) 121.

Controversy Surrounding SAB 121

Introduced in March 2022 and enacted the following month, SAB 121 stipulates that digital asset custodians must report a liability and corresponding assets on their balance sheets for all custodied cryptocurrencies. While not an official agency rule, SEC staff justified the bulletin as a measure to mitigate risks associated with safeguarding crypto assets.

Political Landscape and Senator's Stance

In the House, where Republicans hold the majority, 21 Democrats voted in favor of the resolution. The Senate, on the other hand, requires a simple majority for passage, necessitating at least two Democrats and all Republican Senators to support it. Sources familiar with the matter revealed that multiple Democratic senators plan to vote affirmatively. Senator Kirsten Gillibrand, a long-time advocate for cryptocurrency, publicly announced her backing for Joint Resolution 109. She criticized SAB 121 for bypassing proper consultation with regulatory agencies and Congress, and for deviating from established accounting standards. Gillibrand stressed that the bulletin would restrict consumer options and weaken consumer protection in bankruptcy scenarios.

Last-Ditch Efforts and Potential Consequences

Representative Wiley Nickel of North Carolina sent a letter to SEC Chair Gary Gensler, urging the withdrawal of SAB 121 ahead of the Senate vote. Nickel emphasized the issue's non-partisan nature and the importance of bipartisan collaboration in the custodial banking sector. The White House indicated that President Joe Biden would veto the legislation if it reaches his desk. SEC Chair Gensler defended SAB 121, asserting its alignment with US bankruptcy court precedents. He highlighted the accountability of liabilities on balance sheets, citing previous court rulings that crypto assets are not immune to bankruptcy claims. The SEC has yet to respond to requests for comments on the matter.

meta_value.__cdata: Hill sources anticipate Senate will reverse SAB 121 in upcoming Thursday vote.

title.__cdata: MIT graduates' involvement in a $25 million cryptocurrency crime highlights issues with Ethereum front-running.

encoded.__cdata:
MIT Graduates Arrested for $25 Million Crypto Crime

The Scheme

Anton and James Peraire-Bueno, both in their twenties, devised a scheme that allowed them to pocket a whopping $25 million in just 12 seconds. The brothers, graduates of the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) with elite computer skills, utilized their knowledge to carry out the crime. Their illegal activities were discovered by federal authorities, who described the case as something out of a pulp novel.

The Investigation

The Department of Justice (DOJ) and IRS agents were quick to crack down on the alleged crime committed by the Peraire-Bueno brothers. The masterminds behind the crime were no match for the prosecutors and investigators who utilized cutting-edge technology and traditional investigative methods to solve the case.

The Crime

The sophisticated crime involved a new type of illegal activity on the Ethereum blockchain known as Maximum Extractable Value (MEV). MEV allows those constructing the blockchain to profit from others' transactions by packaging them in a block in a specific way. The Peraire-Bueno brothers went a step further by exploiting a bug in popular software used for MEV, enabling them to manipulate and steal from Ethereum users' transactions.

The Aftermath

While MEV itself is not illegal and has been present in the crypto industry for some time, the Peraire-Bueno brothers' actions have drawn attention to the murky practice. The incident serves as a cautionary tale for individuals with advanced degrees, as even MIT graduates are not immune to making poor decisions. Moreover, evidence revealed that the brothers had searched online for information related to money laundering and financial fraud, highlighting the importance of discretion in criminal activities. In conclusion, the case of the MIT graduates arrested for a $25 million crypto crime sheds light on the potential risks associated with exploiting loopholes in blockchain technology. The incident underscores the need for increased scrutiny of MEV practices and may lead to calls for reforms within the Ethereum community. Ultimately, the Peraire-Bueno brothers' downfall serves as a reminder that no amount of education or technical expertise can protect individuals from the consequences of engaging in illegal activities.

meta_value.__cdata: MIT graduates' involvement in a $25 million cryptocurrency crime highlights issues with Ethereum front-running.

title.__cdata: LINK Surges 18% in a Day while BTC Holds at $66K as Bitcoin ETF Inflows Persist (Market Watch)

encoded.__cdata:
Bitcoin Surges to Multi-Week High, Reclaims $66,000 Level

The price of Bitcoin reached a multi-week high of around $66,600 before experiencing a slight dip of about $1,000. However, it has currently reclaimed the $66,000 level, showcasing resilience in the market.

BTC Back to $66K

Bitcoin faced a challenging end to the previous business week as its price dropped to just above $60,000. Despite the downward trend, the asset managed to bounce back over the weekend and especially on Monday. The bullish momentum continued into the current week, propelling Bitcoin to over $63,000 initially. After a minor setback to $61,200 due to Coinbase issues, the asset surged on Wednesday following the US announcement of the CPI numbers for April.

With increasing inflows into spot Bitcoin ETFs on Wednesday and Thursday, BTC's price reached a three-week high above $66,500. Although there was a minor retracement, the price has climbed back above $66,000 amidst positive ETF flows for the fourth consecutive day. The market cap of Bitcoin maintains its position slightly above $1.3 trillion, although its dominance over altcoins has decreased to 51.7%.

LINK Skyrockets After 18% Surge

While several altcoins experienced a rally, LINK took the spotlight with a significant 18% surge. The total crypto market cap remains above $2.5 trillion on CG, indicating a stable trend in the market. Most alternative coins witnessed green movement similar to Bitcoin, with notable gains seen in Ethereum, Ripple, SOL, ADA, AVAX, DOT, BCH, HBAR, and ICP.

Chainlink, however, outperformed other large-cap altcoins by skyrocketing more than 18% in just one day, surpassing $16 in trading value. Despite minor declines in some altcoins like BNB, DOGE, TON, TRX, and SHIB, the overall market sentiment remains positive following Bitcoin's surge.

title.__cdata: How to connect to zkSync

encoded.__cdata: ## Crypto Community Excited About zkSync Bridge ### Introduction The crypto community is buzzing with excitement over the announcement of a new bridge to zkSync. This innovative solution promises to revolutionize the way users interact with decentralized applications and exchange platforms. ### What is zkSync? zkSync is a layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum that uses zero-knowledge proofs to increase transaction speed and reduce fees. By offloading transactions from the main Ethereum chain to a secondary layer, zkSync is able to greatly improve the scalability and efficiency of the network. ### Benefits of Using zkSync One of the main advantages of zkSync is its ability to significantly reduce transaction costs. By processing transactions off-chain and only periodically settling them on the Ethereum mainnet, users can avoid high gas fees and enjoy near-instant transaction speeds. This makes zkSync an ideal solution for users who want to interact with decentralized applications but are wary of the high costs associated with using the Ethereum network. ### The zkSync Bridge The new bridge to zkSync is set to make it even easier for users to take advantage of the benefits offered by this innovative scaling solution. By providing a seamless connection between the Ethereum mainnet and zkSync, the bridge allows users to move tokens and assets between the two networks with ease. This will open up new opportunities for developers and users alike, making it easier than ever to leverage the power of zkSync for various applications. ### Community Reaction The announcement of the zkSync bridge has sparked a wave of excitement within the crypto community, with many users eager to get their hands on this new solution. Developers are already planning to integrate zkSync into their applications, while users are looking forward to the prospect of lower fees and faster transactions. Overall, the community is optimistic about the potential impact of the zkSync bridge and the opportunities it will create for the future of decentralized finance.

title.__cdata: Craig-Hallum recommends upgrading to buy Miner Hut 8 due to Bitcoin stack providing capital for future projects

encoded.__cdata: # Bitcoin Miner Hut 8 Upgraded to Buy by Craig-Hallum ## Hut 8's Substantial Capital for Future Projects In a recent research report, broker Craig-Hallum highlighted the advantageous position of Bitcoin miner Hut 8 (HUT), which currently holds more than 9,100 bitcoins. This sizable stack of coins gives the company a significant amount of capital to utilize for upcoming projects, according to the report. The analyst team, led by George Sutton, emphasized the value of Hut 8's bitcoin reserves, which account for approximately 75% of its current market capitalization. They described it as not only a protective feature for investors but also as highly opportunistic capital that the company can use for growth initiatives. ## Upgrade in Ratings and Price Target Following the positive evaluation of Hut 8's financial position, Craig-Hallum upgraded the stock from hold to buy. The broker maintained a price target of $12 for the stock while reiterating its optimistic outlook on the company's future prospects. In response to the upgrade, shares of Hut 8 surged over 13% to $8.83 during Wednesday's trading session, buoyed by a notable increase in the price of Bitcoin. The positive momentum carried over to Thursday, with the stock continuing to trade higher by 2% in early market activity. ## Diversified Business Model and Strategic Opportunities The report also highlighted the company's expanding pipeline, which includes not just bitcoin mining opportunities but also high-performance computing (HPC) and artificial intelligence (AI) ventures. Hut 8 is poised to enter the AI services market later this year, with an anticipated annual revenue of $20 million from a new contract. Moreover, Hut 8's strategic partnerships with key energy providers and progress in the regulatory inquiry process were noted as factors that could further enhance its growth potential. The acquisition of Validus assets, comprising four natural gas power plants in Ontario, is expected to bolster the company's cash reserves, according to the broker. With the recent release of first-quarter earnings, Hut 8 reported a significant increase in net income, reaching $250.9 million compared to $17.3 million in the same period the previous year. These developments signal a promising outlook for Hut 8 as it continues to solidify its position in the cryptocurrency market and diversify its business operations.

title.__cdata: According to the Company's CTO, This is Ripple's Most Essential Executive

encoded.__cdata:
The Most Valuable Member of Ripple According to Ripple's CTO

David Schwartz, the chief technology officer at Ripple, recently engaged with users by allowing them to ask him various questions. One user posed a question regarding who was the most important person in Ripple's history, with options including Jed McCaleb, Schwartz, Chris Larsen, Brad Garlinghouse, or others.

Schwartz identified Chris Larsen as the most important person due to his early commitment to the idea when it was challenging to do so. He acknowledged Larsen's belief in Ripple's potential well before himself.

Chris Larsen, one of the co-founders of Ripple Labs, served as the CEO until 2016 when Brad Garlinghouse took over the position.

In December 2020, Ripple, Garlinghouse, and Larsen faced legal action from the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) for allegedly raising over $1.3 billion through an unregistered securities offering by selling XRP. However, the SEC dropped charges against the executives in October 2023, marking a significant victory for Ripple.

The legal battle has progressed into the trial phase, with both parties presenting necessary documents and following court rules. Jeremy Hogan, an American lawyer, stated that the briefs stage has been completed, and now they await the judge's ruling.

Brad Garlinghouse's Key Contributions to Ripple

According to John E Deaton, a prominent US attorney supporting thousands of XRP investors in the legal case against the SEC, Brad Garlinghouse has played a pivotal role in Ripple's legal successes. Deaton believes that Garlinghouse should be recognized as a crucial figure in Ripple's achievements in the legal sphere.

Furthermore, Deaton suggested that Garlinghouse should be considered for the title of "CEO of the decade" if Ripple decides to go public in the coming years. Garlinghouse's leadership and contributions to Ripple's advancements have been acknowledged by industry experts and legal professionals.

title.__cdata: Testing tokenised deposits with Mastercard and Standard Chartered Bank in Hong Kong

encoded.__cdata:
Mastercard and Standard Chartered Bank Hong Kong Successfully Test Tokenised Deposits

Tokenised deposits using Mastercard’s Multi-Token Network

Mastercard (NYSE: MA) and Standard Chartered Bank Hong Kong (SCBHK) have recently achieved a significant milestone in the realm of blockchain technology within Hong Kong’s fintech sandbox. The two entities completed the first live test of tokenised deposits using blockchain technology, marking a crucial step forward in exploring the potential of blockchain in revolutionising banking transactions and asset management. In this groundbreaking initiative, the Mastercard Multi-Token Network (MTN) played a pivotal role. The live test transaction involved a Mox Bank client purchasing a carbon credit, which was subsequently tokenised by SCBHK using Libeara, its innovative tokenization platform. Through the use of blockchain technology, an atomic swap facilitated the seamless transfer of the tokenised deposit and the carbon credit, securely delivering the tokenised asset to the client’s digital wallet. This proof of concept not only showcases the technical feasibility of tokenised deposits but also highlights the potential for enhancing transaction efficiency, transparency, and security within the financial industry. Helena Chen, the Managing Director of Mastercard for Hong Kong and Macau, emphasizes the importance of partnerships with industry leaders like SCBHK and innovative platforms like Libeara in driving transformative applications that reshape consumer-business interactions.

Standard Chartered Hong Kong embracing digital assets

The successful completion of this live test aligns with the forward-looking initiatives of the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA), particularly through projects such as Project Ensemble. Ensemble aims to explore wholesale Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs) and tokenised deposits, underscoring Hong Kong’s commitment to embracing blockchain and digital assets within its financial ecosystem. Standard Chartered Hong Kong’s active involvement in Ensemble, as well as in eHKD retail CBDC trials and multi-CBDC cross-border payment projects like mBridge, further cements the momentum towards digital transformation in finance. Mary Huen, CEO of Standard Chartered Hong Kong, stresses the pivotal role of tokenization in shaping the future of the financial industry. Through collaboration with key partners like Mox Bank, Libeara, and Mastercard, Standard Chartered Hong Kong aims to drive the adoption of tokenization in financial assets under the guidance of HKMA. This pioneering spirit not only positions Hong Kong as a hub for fintech innovation but also sets the stage for broader adoption of blockchain-based solutions globally.

meta_value.__cdata: Testing tokenised deposits with Mastercard and Standard Chartered Bank in Hong Kong

title.__cdata: Arrest of Canada's 'Crypto King' and Associate for Alleged $30M Ponzi Scheme Fraud Charges

encoded.__cdata: ## Canadian Men Arrested in $40 Million Crypto Fraud Scheme In a shocking turn of events, two Canadian men have been arrested and charged with fraud for allegedly swindling investors out of $40 million CAD, which is approximately $30 million USD, in a crypto and foreign exchange investment scheme. ### The Arrests Self-proclaimed “Crypto King” Aiden Pleterski, 25, has been charged with fraud and money laundering for his role in the alleged Ponzi scheme. His associate, 27-year-old Colin Murphy, was charged with fraud, as announced by the Ontario Securities Commission on Wednesday. The criminal charges, stemming from a 16-month investigation known as Project Swan, come as a surprise to many following the ongoing bankruptcy case linked to the alleged scheme, which has been heavily covered by the media in Canada. ### The Allegations Court documents and local media reports indicate that between 2021 and 2022, approximately 160 investors entrusted Pleterski and his company, AP Private Equity Limited, with $40 million in Canadian dollars ($30 million USD) to invest on their behalf in the crypto and foreign exchange markets. Some investors even took out loans to participate in the scheme. The trustee overseeing the bankruptcy case found that Pleterski only invested 2% of the funds received, spending at least $16 million on personal luxuries like luxury cars, international travel, and a leased $8.4 million lakefront mansion. Assets such as two McLarens, two BMWs, and a Lamborghini were seized during the bankruptcy process. ### Alleged Kidnapping and Aftermath In a bizarre twist, Pleterski was reportedly kidnapped, beaten, and tortured in December 2022 by five victims of his alleged Ponzi scheme. After three days of captivity, he was released following a ransom demand to his landlord-turned-mentor. Pleterski's troubles continued as NBA player Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, who had purchased the mansion linked to Pleterski, faced threats related to the property and sought to back out of the purchase. ### Next Steps Pleterski was released on $100,000 bail, with conditions that include surrendering his passport, refraining from discussing financial matters on social media, and avoiding crypto trading. The Ontario Securities Commission has promised further updates on the case.

meta_value.__cdata: Arrest of Canada's 'Crypto King' and Associate for Alleged $30M Ponzi Scheme Fraud Charges

title.__cdata: An Unconventional Interview with Hackers Associated with the Russian Military Targeting US Water Utilities

encoded.__cdata:
A Mbodied Questional

Following an interview with Julia Ostroukhova, the self-proclaimed leader of the Cyber Army of Russia, several questions have arisen regarding the group's actual ties and intentions. One particular statement made by Julia sparked confusion regarding the relationship between the Cyber Army of Russia and the Sandworm hacker group. While Julia mentioned a shared commander-in-chief overseeing both groups, it remains unclear whether this implies a shared leader, an ideological connection, or a hierarchical structure.

Russian Linkages

Experts in Russian information warfare and influence operations who reviewed the interview noted that despite claims of independence, the Cyber Army of Russia aligns closely with the Russian government and military's rhetoric. Their advocacy for influencing civilian infrastructure beyond conflict lines mirrors concepts outlined in Russian military doctrine. Furthermore, Julia's statements on cultural conservatism and non-traditional sexual relations echo sentiments expressed by Russian leaders and state media.

Gavin Wilde, a senior fellow at the Carnegie Endowment for International Peace, suggests that the Cyber Army of Russia's comments may be an attempt to garner support from potential government sponsors in Moscow. The group's emphasis on messaging geared towards domestic and political benefactors rather than a Western audience indicates a strategic move to align with Russian interests.

Begging for Government Support

During the interview, Julia explicitly expressed her desire for official government backing for the Cyber Army of Russia. She expressed hopes for financial support and the establishment of cyber troops within the Russian Armed Forces. This plea for governmental endorsement suggests the group's aspiration for a more formal relationship with state authorities.

Interestingly, despite claiming to influence Western politics, the Cyber Army of Russia posts exclusively in Russian on its Telegram channel. This departure from other Russian influence operations, such as Guccifer 2.0 and DCLeaks, which communicated in English, raises questions about the group's true motives and target audience.
