title.__cdata: Revolutionary Data Access with Pyth Price Feeds on Xion Blockchain

encoded.__cdata:
Xion Launches Pyth Price Feeds for Mainstream Adoption

Pioneering Blockchain Technology Integration

In a significant move towards mainstream adoption of blockchain technology, Pyth Price Feeds have been officially launched on Xion, ushering in a new era of decentralized consumer applications. Xion, known for simplifying user interactions and abstracting blockchain complexities, has partnered with Pyth, a leading real-time market data provider, to offer developers access to over 500 high-quality price feeds.

Empowering Developers with Real-Time Data

The integration of Pyth’s oracle onto the Xion blockchain is a major milestone in the evolution of decentralized finance (DeFi) and consumer applications. With access to Pyth’s network of price feeds covering traditional and digital asset classes, developers on Xion can now leverage real-time data to build innovative applications that drive mass adoption. Burnt Banksy, a core contributor at Xion, expressed enthusiasm about the partnership, stating that the integration with Pyth’s industry-leading oracle will empower developers with high-frequency data feeds to build the next generation of consumer applications.

Paving the Way for Mainstream Adoption

Xion, as a layer one blockchain, has been meticulously designed to simplify user experiences and promote global mainstream adoption through crypto abstraction. By abstracting complexities such as accounts, signatures, gas fees, and interoperability, Xion provides a fertile ground for the creation of Web3 projects aimed at reaching mainstream audiences worldwide. The deployment of Pyth’s pull oracle on Xion allows applications to seamlessly access real-time price updates from the Pythnet appchain. This gas-efficient architecture ensures that users within the Xion ecosystem consistently receive accurate market data without latency or pricing discrepancies. Developers on Xion leveraging Pyth’s data can create responsive and reliable applications capable of reacting to market changes in real-time. The integration of Pyth’s permissionless access to off-chain data opens up new possibilities for building consumer-facing applications with enhanced user experiences. Xion’s collaboration with Pyth signifies a strategic alignment towards democratizing access to decentralized technologies. By combining Xion’s Generalized Abstraction capabilities with Pyth’s comprehensive data products, developers are well-positioned to lead the charge towards a future where Web3 is accessible to everyone. As the partnership between Pyth and Xion sets a new standard for decentralized applications, the future of Web3 on Xion looks promising. Developers are set to leverage Pyth’s robust data infrastructure to create transformative applications that bring blockchain technology closer to mainstream adoption. With Xion’s commitment to simplicity and Pyth’s dedication to reliability, a revolution in decentralized consumer applications is on the horizon.

title.__cdata: Coinbase Aims to Serve Cryptocurrency Demand in Australia's $600 Billion Pension Sector

encoded.__cdata: ## Coinbase Targets Australia’s Self-Managed Pensions Sector ### Coinbase's Expansion Plans Coinbase Global Inc., the largest US crypto exchange, is eyeing potential demand in Australia's growing self-managed pensions sector. The exchange is working on developing a service specifically targeting this segment, revealed Asia-Pacific Managing Director John O’Loghlen. Self-managed super funds in Australia make up around a quarter of the country's $2.5 trillion pension system, with an impressive A$1 billion ($664 million) already allocated to cryptoassets, as per the latest Australian Taxation Office data. ### Increasing Interest in Cryptoassets With inflows into self-managed retirement funds on the rise and Bitcoin's price surging by 55% this year, cryptoassets held within these funds are set to reach record levels. However, traditional institutional money managers in Australia have been hesitant to venture into the digital asset sector due to its past scandals and high volatility. ### Coinbase's Offering for Self-Managed Funds In an interview, O’Loghlen explained how self-managed super funds typically make a single allocation and leave it untouched. Coinbase aims to cater to these clients by providing them with a specialized offering that allows them to trade and stay with the platform. The debut of US spot-Bitcoin exchange-traded funds earlier this year has been a significant boost for the crypto market, leading to an all-time peak in March. ### Overcoming Obstacles Despite the growing interest in cryptoassets, there are still concerns about the risks associated with this speculative market. Financial advisers like Michael Houlihan advise caution and recommend keeping crypto holdings limited, especially for younger investors with lower account balances. ### Competitors Eyeing the Self-Managed Opportunity Not only Coinbase but also global rivals like Kraken and local players such as BTC Markets Pty and Independent Reserve Pty are looking to tap into the self-managed pensions sector. These platforms are focusing on building relationships with financial advisers and developing tools to attract clients that hold self-managed super funds. ### Future Development in Australia As Australia gears up to introduce more crypto ETFs before the end of 2024, industry experts anticipate continued growth in the crypto market. ASX Ltd. is expected to approve the first spot-Bitcoin ETFs for the main board in the coming months, signaling a positive outlook for the industry. With the crypto landscape evolving rapidly, Coinbase and its competitors are gearing up to seize opportunities in Australia's self-managed pensions sector.

meta_value.__cdata: Coinbase Aims to Serve Cryptocurrency Demand in Australia's $600 Billion Pension Sector

title.__cdata: Why is the New Apple Pencil Pro Not Compatible with Older Devices?

encoded.__cdata: # Apple's New Pencil Pro Raises Concerns Among Users ## Compatibility Issues with Older iPad Models The release of Apple's new Pencil Pro has left some users feeling frustrated due to its limited compatibility with older iPad models. The new stylus is only compatible with the latest 2024 iPad Pro and iPad Air models, leaving users of older devices unable to use the new accessory. Users who have invested in the 2022 iPad Pro, which was released two years ago at a significant cost, are disappointed to find that they cannot use the new Pencil Pro with their device. To make matters worse, even users looking to upgrade to the newer models from older iPads will also face compatibility issues with their existing second-gen Apple Pencil. ## Lack of Backward Compatibility Apple's decision to restrict the compatibility of the new stylus to only the latest models has raised concerns among users. The lack of backward compatibility means that users will need to invest in a new Pencil Pro if they want to use it with the new iPad Pro or iPad Air. While Apple has introduced a "new magnetic interface" for the Pencil Pro, there are no significant improvements in terms of charging speed, pairing, or magnet strength compared to the previous model. This move has left many questioning why such a simple accessory like a stylus cannot be made backward compatible with older devices. ## Performance Concerns and User Frustrations Some users speculate that the lack of compatibility may be due to processing power limitations on older iPad models. However, if the M2 chipset in the 2022 iPad Pro is already struggling to handle the new stylus features, it raises concerns about the performance capabilities of Apple's silicon. Overall, users are frustrated with the limited compatibility of the new Pencil Pro and believe that Apple should ensure that all their current lineup of devices support at least the second-gen Apple Pencil, Pencil Pro, and USB-C Apple Pencil. The unnecessary complexity of having multiple stylus options only adds to the confusion and frustration among users. In conclusion, the lack of compatibility with older devices contradicts Apple's motto of "it just works" and has left many users feeling disappointed with the company's decision.

meta_value.__cdata: Why is the New Apple Pencil Pro Not Compatible with Older Devices?

title.__cdata: New Whales and Long-Term Holders Strengthen Bitcoin Support at $60,000

encoded.__cdata:
Bitcoin Rebounds Above $60,000

Bitcoin, the world's leading cryptocurrency, has seen a significant recovery this week, exceeding the $66,000 mark. This uptrend comes after a period of stagnation and uncertainty in the market post-halving.

The latest data suggests that the $60,000 price level has emerged as a crucial support zone for Bitcoin. This support is reinforced by the accumulation of new whales - addresses holding over 1,000 BTC for less than 6 months - and the steady position of long-term holders.

New Whales Favor $60,000 Support

CryptoQuant's recent findings indicate that new whales have been accumulating Bitcoin around the $60,000 level. These new whales, attracted by the influx of institutional investors following the approval of spot Bitcoin ETFs in the US, have established $60,000 as a key support level on-chain.

The average acquisition cost for these new whales stands at $60,000, showcasing their confidence in entering the market and the strength of this price level as a solid floor for Bitcoin. The introduction of institutional capital from spot ETFs has further validated $60,000 as a critical support zone.

Stability Among Long-Term Whales

On the flip side, long-term whales - who have held over 1,000 BTC for more than 6 months - have demonstrated a stable realized price. This stability reflects their experienced strategies and long-term accumulation approach, indicating a strong confidence in Bitcoin's enduring value despite short-term market fluctuations.

Increased Liquidity Supports Bullish Sentiment

Accompanying the market-wide recovery is a surge in the volume of stablecoins entering the market. This increase in stablecoin inflows has coincided with Bitcoin's price fluctuations, pointing towards enhanced liquidity in the market.

Heightened liquidity levels are crucial for sustaining the ongoing uptrend, further bolstering the bullish narrative surrounding Bitcoin's recent rebound.

title.__cdata: Millennium Mgt and Wisconsin Retirement System Invested in Bitcoin ETFs in Q1

encoded.__cdata:
Hedge Funds and Asset Managers Ramp Up Investments in Bitcoin ETFs

New York-based Hedge Funds Leads the Way

In a recent surge of interest, several hedge funds and asset managers have been acquiring stakes in the newly launched U.S. exchange-traded funds (ETFs) tied to the price of bitcoin. Among these institutions is Millennium Management LLC, based in New York, which revealed a staggering $2 billion investment in various bitcoin ETFs by the end of the first quarter of the year.

Investment Trends in Bitcoin ETFs

Millennium's portfolio includes positions in well-known funds such as BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust and the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust, as well as offerings from issuers like Bitwise Investments and ARK Investment Management. Other notable purchasers in this trend have been Boston-based hedge fund manager Bracebridge Capital, which held $262 million in the ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF and $81 million in the BlackRock product.

Wisconsin Investment Board's Involvement

The state of Wisconsin's investment board, responsible for managing $156 billion in assets for the Wisconsin Retirement System, also disclosed significant purchases in the bitcoin ETF space. The board revealed holdings of over $99 million in BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust and more than $63 million in the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust.

Engagement from Retail Investors

While hedge funds have taken substantial positions in bitcoin ETFs, retail investors, including investment advisors, remain a dominant force in this market. Hightower Advisors, a prominent advisory firm, disclosed holdings of approximately $68 million in bitcoin ETFs, showcasing the widespread appeal of these products across different investor segments.

Continued Growth Expected

As the trend towards bitcoin ETF investments continues to gain traction, experts anticipate further growth in institutional ownership. According to Matt Hougan, chief investment officer of Bitwise, as many as 700 institutions may own $5 billion or more in bitcoin ETFs once all filings are processed. This surge in interest has not only helped drive the price of bitcoin to new highs but has also highlighted the evolving landscape of cryptocurrency investments. As the market evolves, regulators and investors alike will be closely monitoring the impact of these investments on the broader financial ecosystem.

title.__cdata: The Senate Provides a Lifeline for the Affordable Connectivity Program

encoded.__cdata:
Senators Propose Funding for Affordable Connectivity Program

New Plan to Revive the Affordable Connectivity Program

A new plan has been proposed by a bipartisan group of senators to revive the Affordable Connectivity Program, an initiative that provides discounts on high-speed internet access to low-income households in the United States. At the end of April, funding for the program was set to run out, affecting millions of households.

Proposal for Funding

The group of senators, led by Ben Ray Luján of New Mexico, have proposed using a Federal Aviation Administration reauthorization measure as a vehicle for funding the ACP and other telecom programs, with a combined $6 billion. The coalition includes senators J.D. Vance, Peter Welch, Jacky Rosen, Steve Daines, and Roger Wicker. Luján emphasized the importance of the program, stating that over 23 million households and 55 million people are currently benefiting from it.

Inclusion of FCC's "Rip and Replace" Program

The proposed measure also includes a provision for the Federal Communication Commission’s “rip and replace program,” which refunds US telecom providers for removing equipment from Chinese manufacturers like Huawei and ZTE from their networks. The FCC has requested around $2 billion from Congress to bolster the program, which has faced a shortfall. This initiative has been in place since 2020 when Huawei and ZTE were identified as national security threats.

Support from the Biden Administration

The Biden administration has shown support for the expansion of broadband access and significant investments in the ACP. President Biden has called on Congress to reinvest in the program, highlighting the necessity of high-speed internet access in today's society. It is crucial to adequately fund the “rip-and-replace” program to ensure national security and empower the FCC to reauction spectrum licenses for better internet connectivity. In conclusion, the proposed funding for the Affordable Connectivity Program and the inclusion of the “rip-and-replace” program aim to address the digital divide and ensure access to high-speed internet for all households, especially those in low-income communities.

meta_value.__cdata: The Senate Provides a Lifeline for the Affordable Connectivity Program

title.__cdata: Did You Miss Out on Ethereum? This Obscure Cryptocurrency Could Be Poised for Significant Growth

encoded.__cdata: ### Cryptocurrency Sui Emerges as Potential Ethereum Competitor Since its launch nearly a decade ago, Ethereum has become one of the most successful crypto investments, with a market valuation of $354 billion. With its rise to the top, Ethereum has dominated the blockchain world, becoming the second most valuable crypto globally. Now, a new cryptocurrency, Sui, is starting to gain attention as a potential Ethereum competitor. #### What is Sui and Why Should You Care? Sui, pronounced "swee," is a Layer 1 blockchain like Ethereum, but it claims to be faster, more efficient, and cheaper to use. With the potential to handle 297,000 transactions per second, Sui offers low latency and 100% uptime, making it ideal for decentralized finance and Web3 gaming. The founding team of Sui includes executives and developers from Facebook, adding credibility to the project. The Sui blockchain officially launched in May 2023, making it a relatively new player in the blockchain space. Despite being a newcomer, Sui has attracted over $300 million in investments from venture capitalists, indicating strong support for its potential to succeed. #### Sui's Mobile Crypto Strategy and Growth Potential Sui's upcoming catalyst for 2025 is the launch of a new handheld gaming device, SuiPlay0x1, integrated with the Sui blockchain. The device, priced around $500, will offer games from Sui and other partners. Early reviews suggest positive feedback, but the success of the product remains uncertain. Ethereum's meteoric rise from less than $1 to an all-time high of $4,892 demonstrates the potential for cryptocurrencies to grow exponentially. Sui, currently trading around $1, has the potential to mimic Ethereum's growth trajectory if its mobile crypto strategy resonates with users. With the ambitious goal of capturing market share in key blockchain niches, Sui has the potential to rival Ethereum in the long run. While challenges exist in dethroning Ethereum as the market leader, Sui's innovative approach and backing from experienced technologists make it a cryptocurrency worth monitoring. #### Should You Invest in Sui? As of now, Sui trades around $1, making it an affordable entry point for investors looking to capitalize on its growth potential. Whether Sui can achieve Ethereum-like success remains to be seen, but with the right strategy and market adoption, there's no telling how high Sui's value could soar in the future. For investors seeking opportunities in the crypto space, Sui presents an intriguing possibility to capitalize on the next big thing in blockchain technology.

title.__cdata: Climate protesters determined to stop Tesla are causing chaos in protests.

encoded.__cdata:
Mara's Protest Against Tesla in Germany

Tesla Factory Protest

Mara, a 24-year-old woman, has been living in a forest near Tesla's German gigafactory since March. Despite the oppressive heat, Mara is suffering from a cold that has spread through the mosquito-infested camp. She left Berlin to live among the pine trees in an effort to stop the company from expanding.

Upcoming Protest

This week, Mara will be joined by the notorious German climate group, Here And No Further (Ende Gelände), for a five-day-long protest against Tesla. Anticipating hundreds of demonstrators, Tesla announced it would shut down the factory for four days. This decision prompted the employees to work from home, according to an internal email obtained by the German newspaper, Handelsblatt.

Protest Preparations

Despite the absence of Tesla workers, the company employees and local authorities are on high alert for potential troublemakers. The factory is only separated from the forest by a thin fence. Police cars patrol the area, and security measures are visibly increased around the factory perimeter.

The Anti-Tesla Movement

Mara estimates that there are 50 to 100 people involved in the anti-Tesla movement. Yet, the forest camp appears quiet on a Thursday afternoon. Treehouses above the camp provide shelter, and activists display their political beliefs through banners hanging from the trees.

The Environmental Impact

The protesters argue that Tesla's presence in Germany poses a threat to local water supplies and democracy. They believe that Tesla's ambition to produce 1 million electric cars a year is a byproduct of "green capitalism," designed to maintain consumerism under the guise of environmental friendliness.

Symbol of Protest

To Mara and others, Tesla represents a symbol of how the green transition has been distorted. As a result, the German gigafactory has become the target of increasingly radical protests. Activists moved into the forest to physically block Tesla from expanding, and in a separate incident, unknown saboteurs blew up a nearby power line, forcing the factory to close for a week. In conclusion, Mara and her fellow activists are determined to make their voices heard and challenge Tesla's expansion plans in Germany.

meta_value.__cdata: Climate protesters determined to stop Tesla are causing chaos in protests.

title.__cdata: Meme Coin with Trump Theme Reaches All-Time High as Presidential Campaign News Unfolds

encoded.__cdata:
Trump-Themed Meme Coin TREMP Reaches All-Time High Amid Positive Campaign News

The cryptocurrency market saw a green day on May 17, with notable digital assets like Solana, Cardano, Avalanche, Polkadot, and Chainlink experiencing significant gains. However, the meme coin sector had few exceptions, with Doland Tremp (TREMP) standing out by surging 60% in the last 24 hours to reach a new all-time high of $1.07 according to CoinGecko.

Trump's Campaign News

The surge in TREMP, a coin themed around former US President Donald Trump, coincides with major developments in his campaign. Reports indicate that Trump leads in five out of six crucial swing states, positioning himself as a strong contender against current President Joe Biden in the upcoming November elections.

Swing states play a vital role in US presidential elections as they are neither dominantly Republican nor Democrat, making them crucial battlegrounds.

Another significant event related to Trump is the hush-money trial involving Stormy Daniels, a pornographic film actress who alleged an affair with Trump before his 2016 election. Trump has denied the allegations, and his defense has raised questions about the credibility of witnesses in the trial.

Trump's Pro-Crypto Stance

While in office, Trump was critical of cryptocurrencies, but his stance has softened in 2024. He now describes himself as the candidate for pro-crypto voters, contrasting himself with Biden and his cabinet, who are seen as anti-crypto.

“I can live with it. If you are in favor of crypto, you better vote for Trump.”

These comments were followed by a price surge in another meme coin associated with him, MAGA (TRUMP), which set a new all-time high over $10 on May 16.

title.__cdata: Soft Inflation Data Sparks Crypto Rally, Bitcoin Reaches $66K

encoded.__cdata:
Crypto Market Rallies on Softer U.S. Inflation Data

Crypto markets rallied on Wednesday as softer-than-expected U.S. inflation data jolted digital assets from their stupor. Bitcoin surged past $66,000 for the first time since April 24, while altcoins like Solana and NEAR led the gains.

Bitcoin and Altcoin Performance

Bitcoin reached its highest price since April 24 and was up more than 7% over the past 24 hours. On the other hand, Ether changed hands near $3,000 with a 4% advance. Solana and NEAR saw significant gains of 8% and 12% respectively. The CoinDesk 20 Index also showed a 6% increase.

Market Reaction to U.S. Inflation Data

The rally was triggered by April U.S. Consumer Price Index (CPI) figures, which were lower than March, along with a slightly sluggish retail sales report. This data came as a relief for investors, easing fears of reaccelerating inflation and a hot economy prompting the Federal Reserve to reconsider its policies.

Bitfinex analysts noted that the decrease in CPI inflation over the last three months, combined with the Fed's intention to taper its balance sheet run-off, was seen as positive for risk assets.

Traditional Market Response

U.S. equities also climbed on the same day, with the S&P 500 index reaching a new all-time high, showcasing a return in risk appetite among investors.

Bitcoin's Breakout

Today's surge in Bitcoin marked a break-out from a downtrend that had capped prices in recent weeks. Swissblock analysts said this move opened the way for BTC to potentially target $69,000 and even reach new all-time highs at $84,000. The breakout also signals a positive trend for altcoins, which are expected to follow strongly in the next leg up.

title.__cdata: Final Net Neutrality Order: FCC Shuts Down 'Fast Lane' Loophole

encoded.__cdata: ## FCC Releases Final Net Neutrality Order The Federal Communications Commission (FCC) unveiled its final net neutrality order on Tuesday, making significant adjustments from the draft version to prevent internet service providers from circumventing fast-lane bans. ### Ensuring Fair Practices In an interview with WIRED, a senior FCC official disclosed that the final order includes provisions to prohibit paid fast lanes in consumer-facing products, ensuring compliance with the agency’s rules. Additionally, providers are barred from disguising consumer products as enterprise offerings to evade regulations. ### Net Neutrality Reinstated In April, the FCC reinstated net neutrality rules, reclassifying broadband as a “common carrier” service under Title II of the Telecommunications Act. This move aims to prevent ISPs like AT&T and Verizon from engaging in blocking, throttling, or implementing pay-to-play fast lanes for online services. ### Challenges and Criticisms Critics raised concerns that the draft rules did not adequately address emerging technologies such as 5G and network slicing. Telecom executives argued that network slicing, which involves segmenting a network into varying speed tiers, should be exempt from fast lane restrictions. ### Balancing Innovation and Regulation Despite the potential benefits of network slicing for industries like autonomous vehicles and remote surgery equipment, the FCC emphasized that efforts to circumvent net neutrality requirements would not be tolerated. This stance aims to ensure fair competition and consumer protection in the evolving digital landscape. ### Addressing State Initiatives The final order also addresses concerns about preempting state-led efforts to promote broadband affordability. A recent federal appeals court decision overturned a ruling preventing New York from enforcing a law mandating low-cost broadband programs. The FCC confirmed that its rules would not interfere with New York’s program or similar initiatives in other states. In conclusion, the FCC’s final net neutrality order seeks to strike a balance between fostering innovation and protecting consumer interests in an increasingly complex digital environment.

meta_value.__cdata: Final Net Neutrality Order: FCC Shuts Down 'Fast Lane' Loophole

title.__cdata: Can Spot Bitcoin ETFs Make You a Millionaire?

encoded.__cdata:
Spot Bitcoin ETFs: A Path to Millionaire Status

Bitcoin's Growth Trajectory and the Spot ETFs

Since its inception 15 years ago, Bitcoin has seen an incredible increase of over 18,000% in value, creating numerous millionaires along the way. Now, with the approval of 11 spot Bitcoin ETFs by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission in January 2024, investing in Bitcoin has become as simple as buying a stock through a brokerage account. These spot Bitcoin ETFs track the price of Bitcoin, making it easier for investors to gain exposure to the cryptocurrency's potential for wealth creation. With Bitcoin still in the early stages of adoption, analysts compare its current stage to the early days of the internet, suggesting a similar wealth-creating opportunity. Additionally, the approval of these ETFs has attracted institutional investors to the Bitcoin market, further increasing demand and putting pressure on Bitcoin's limited supply.

Understanding the Effect of Fees

While investing in Bitcoin directly may offer the best growth potential, spot Bitcoin ETFs are a viable option for those looking to reach millionaire status. However, investors must be mindful of the fees associated with these ETFs. Each Bitcoin ETF charges fees for its services, ranging from 0.19% to 1.5%. These fees can have a significant impact on an investor's returns over time. For example, a hypothetical scenario shows that a difference of 1% in fees can lead to a $3 million gap in returns over 30 years.

Striking a Balance with AUM

In addition to fees, investors should consider assets under management (AUM) when choosing a Bitcoin ETF. ETFs with higher AUM tend to have greater liquidity, making it easier to buy or sell shares without impacting the price significantly. Funds with larger AUM also have access to more resources and experienced portfolio managers, which can improve tracking performance and reduce errors. Currently, the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust has the highest AUM at over $18 billion, while BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust and Fidelity Wise Origin Bitcoin Fund offer a balance between AUM and fees.

Becoming a Millionaire

With Bitcoin's potential for future growth and the accessibility of spot Bitcoin ETFs, investors have a straightforward path to becoming millionaires through cryptocurrency investments. By striking a balance between fees and AUM, investors can maximize their returns and capitalize on Bitcoin's wealth-creating abilities.

meta_value.__cdata: Can Spot Bitcoin ETFs Make You a Millionaire?

title.__cdata: Chainlink (LINK) Rises by Double Digits to Reach Monthly Highs: Explained

encoded.__cdata:
Chainlink Surges Following Successful Pilot Program with DTCC

Chainlink (LINK) experienced a significant price increase, jumping over 18% in the last 24 hours after completing a pilot program with the Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation (DTCC).

DTCC Completes Blockchain Pilot Project

The DTCC, the largest securities settlement system globally, partnered with Chainlink and major U.S. financial institutions to execute the Smart NAV pilot project. The initiative, as detailed in a report by DTCC, aimed to simplify the tokenization process of traditional finance funds using Chainlink’s CCIP protocol, ultimately promoting broader institutional adoption of blockchain technology.

The successful completion of the pilot demonstrated the effective delivery of structured data on-chain and integration into various on-chain use cases, such as tokenized funds and bulk consumer smart contracts. The project showcased the potential for real-time, automated data dissemination and access to historical data, enhancing efficiency, speed of settlements, and transparency in operational processes.

Following the announcement of the pilot's success, Chainlink's LINK token saw a positive response, with its price surging over 18% and exceeding $16 for the first time since April 12. At the time of writing, the token is trading at $16.5, with a daily trading volume of slightly over $1 billion, signaling a 195.4% increase in the past 24 hours.

Real-World Assets Tokenization

This development aligns with the broader trend of tokenizing real-world assets, including bonds, funds, and traditional investments. Tokenization has emerged as a popular application of blockchain technology, attracting major financial players like BlackRock, Citi, and HSBC, who seek operational efficiencies, faster settlements, and increased transparency.

Participants in the Smart NAV project included American Century Investments, BNY Mellon, Edward Jones, Franklin Templeton, Invesco, JPMorgan, MFS Investment Management, Mid Atlantic Trust, State Street, and U.S. Bank. The project aims to provide reliable data across blockchain networks for business workflows, with DTCC as the data provider and Chainlink's CCIP acting as the interoperability layer.

title.__cdata: Bitcoin ETF holders include Izzy Englander's Millennium and Paul Singer's Elliott.

encoded.__cdata:
Investment Whales Revealed Their Allocations in Bitcoin Exchange-Traded Funds

State of Wisconsin Leads the Pack

In a surprising revelation, the State of Wisconsin disclosed a whopping $161 million allocation into spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds on Tuesday. This disclosure set the stage for more big names to follow suit in the days to come.

Millennium Management's Massive Holdings

Hedge fund Millennium Management, known for managing over $64 billion in assets, reported holdings of roughly $2 billion across various spot bitcoin ETFs. According to their filing, the fund's largest allocation was in BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT), amounting to around $844 million. Additionally, the fund held substantial positions in Fidelity Wise Origin Bitcoin Fund (FBTC), Grayscale's Bitcoin Trust (GBTC), ARK/21's ARKB, and Bitwise's BITW.

Elliott Capital and Apollo Management Holdings Join the Bandwagon

Another prominent hedge fund, Paul Singer's Elliott Capital, disclosed a stake of nearly $12 million in BlackRock's IBIT as of the end of the quarter, showcasing their confidence in the potential of bitcoin ETFs. Similarly, Apollo Management Holdings also entered the fray by revealing a quarter-end $53.2 million stake in ARK/21's ARKB.

Further Inclusions and Notable Names

As the deadline for institutional investors' quarterly 13F reports loomed, additional big players unveiled their positions in the spot bitcoin funds. Names such as Aristeia Capital and Hudson Bay Capital emerged as investors who allocated assets into these lucrative ETFs, signaling growing institutional interest in the cryptocurrency space. The surge in institutional allocations in bitcoin exchange-traded funds underscores the increasing acceptance and adoption of cryptocurrencies within traditional finance circles. With more investment whales diving into the market, the future looks promising for the digital asset ecosystem.

title.__cdata: Could Your Wallet Ecosystem Be Limiting You? Find Out With Klever

encoded.__cdata: ## Klever: Revolutionizing the Crypto Industry ### Introduction The crypto industry offers diverse opportunities, allowing users to tap into new investment opportunities. Klever, a blockchain company headquartered in Switzerland, prides itself on a cohort of products that serve as game changers in the market. Founded in 2019 by Dio Ianakiara, Klever has over 100 employees with expertise from diverse backgrounds driving innovation. With over four million downloads across more than 190 countries worldwide, Klever offers a suite of products that ease users’ crypto experiences. ### Klever Blockchain Klever blockchain, also known as KleverChain, is a layer-1 blockchain network launched in July 2022. Serving as an alternative to Ethereum, Tron, Solana, and other blockchains, KleverChain uses the proof-of-stake (PoS) consensus model to process fast and inexpensive transactions. With a peak usage of 3,000 transactions per second, the blockchain network fosters an energy-efficient ecosystem with validators securing the network. ### Klever Wallet Klever Wallet is a multi-chain crypto wallet that supports over 10,000 crypto assets like BTC, ETH, and SHIB. A self-custodial wallet, Klever Wallet allows users to create accounts by generating 24 seed words for access to the digital wallet. The wallet also comes with a Klever browser for accessing dApps, crypto swaps, and staking capabilities. ### KleverSafe KleverSafe is a hardware wallet developed by Klever Labs to store, buy, exchange, and grow crypto assets offline. Featuring strong protection and IP67 waterproof build, KleverSafe aims to safeguard users’ private keys from potential online threats. ### KleverScan KleverScan, or KleverExplorer, is the blockchain browser for the Klever community. Providing a complete browsing and search experience, KleverScan empowers users with information such as blocks, transactions, accounts, and market cap. ### VoxSwap VoxSwap is a cryptocurrency-swapping platform built upon Klever technology, prioritizing privacy, security, and usability for users. Offering a seamless experience for exchanging cryptocurrencies, VoxSwap is a valuable tool for users in the crypto market. In conclusion, Klever has revolutionized the crypto industry with its innovative products and services, making it easier for users to navigate the complexities of the market. With a focus on user experience and security, Klever continues to make strides in the blockchain ecosystem.

meta_value.__cdata: Could Your Wallet Ecosystem Be Limiting You? Find Out With Klever

title.__cdata: Current updates on blockchain technology around the globe

encoded.__cdata:
Blockchain Technology: The Backbone of Cryptocurrencies

A New Era of Digital Transactions

The world of digital transactions has been revolutionized by blockchain technology. This innovative system, which underlies all cryptocurrencies, has changed the way we think about financial transactions.

Transparency and Security

One of the key features of blockchain technology is transparency. Every transaction is recorded on a public ledger, making it virtually impossible to alter or tamper with. This level of security has made blockchain technology the preferred choice for many industries, from finance to healthcare.

Decentralization and Peer-to-Peer Trading

Unlike traditional banking systems, which rely on a central authority to verify transactions, blockchain technology is decentralized. This means that transactions are verified by a network of users, rather than a single institution. This peer-to-peer trading system has eliminated the need for intermediaries, reducing costs and increasing efficiency.

The Future of Blockchain Technology

As blockchain technology continues to evolve, new applications and use cases are constantly being explored. From supply chain management to voting systems, the potential uses of blockchain are limitless. With major companies such as IBM and Microsoft investing heavily in blockchain research, the future looks bright for this revolutionary technology.

Conclusion

In conclusion, blockchain technology is not just the backbone of cryptocurrencies, but also a game-changer in the world of digital transactions. Its unparalleled security, transparency, and decentralization make it the ideal solution for a wide range of industries. As we look towards the future, it is clear that blockchain technology will play a crucial role in shaping the world of tomorrow.

meta_value.__cdata: Current updates on blockchain technology around the globe

title.__cdata: DOJ arrests brothers in suspected $25M cryptocurrency fraud scheme

encoded.__cdata: # Two Brothers Arrested in $25M Cryptocurrency Fraud Scheme ## Unveiling the Scheme Federal authorities have recently apprehended two brothers, James Pepaire-Bueno, 28, from New York, and Anton Peraire-Bueno, 24, from Boston, for their involvement in an elaborate plot to steal millions of dollars' worth of cryptocurrency in a groundbreaking case. The U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) charged the siblings with conspiracy to commit wire fraud, wire fraud, and conspiracy to commit money laundering, alleging that they exploited the etherum blockchain to siphon off $25 million from unsuspecting traders. The indictment revealed that the duo, who are alumni of a prestigious university in the U.S., used their expertise in math and computer science to access and manipulate pending transactions, diverting the stolen assets into their own accounts and employing multiple methods to conceal their tracks. ## The Swift Heist The Pepaire-Bueno brothers meticulously planned the scheme for months, but the execution of the heist itself only took a mere 12 seconds. Additionally, after successfully acquiring the stolen cryptocurrency, the pair repeatedly rebuffed requests to return the funds, as per the allegations outlined in the indictment. ## Facing the Consequences U.S. Attorney Damian Williams for the Southern District of New York emphasized the unprecedented nature of the case, highlighting that the brothers used their specialized skills to interfere with the protocols relied upon by numerous Ethereum users worldwide. He underscored the novelty of the brothers' alleged scheme, stating that it had never before been prosecuted. As a result of their actions, James and Anton were scheduled for separate court appearances in their respective cities before U.S. Magistrate Judge Paul G. Levenson for the District of Massachusetts and U.S. Magistrate Judge Valerie Figueredo for the Southern District of New York. In the event of a conviction, the brothers could each face up to 20 years in federal prison for each of the charges brought against them. ## Conclusion Regardless of the scheme's sophistication or the novel techniques employed, Williams declared that the prosecutors would relentlessly pursue individuals who undermine the integrity of financial systems. The case serves as a stark reminder that fraudulent activities within the cryptocurrency sphere will not go unpunished.

meta_value.__cdata: DOJ arrests brothers in suspected $25M cryptocurrency fraud scheme

title.__cdata: DTCC Successfully Implements Pilot Program for Sending Data to Chainlink

encoded.__cdata: ## DTCC Completes Smart NAV Pilot Using Chainlink The Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation (DTCC) recently announced the successful completion of the Smart NAV pilot, a groundbreaking initiative that involved collaboration with ten market participants. This pilot project utilized Chainlink, the leading cross-chain interoperability platform, to deploy data on-chain and integrate it into various blockchain applications. The completion of the Smart NAV pilot marks a significant milestone in the ongoing digital transformation of financial services. ### Leveraging Chainlink for Secure Data Transmission By harnessing the power of Chainlink, a decentralized oracle network, DTCC was able to ensure the secure and efficient transmission of Net Asset Value (NAV) data, a critical metric for investment funds. The system implemented during the pilot enabled real-time data dissemination and automation, while also providing access to historical data. DTCC took a leadership role as the "solution governor" in the chain, ensuring the protection of data throughout the process. The data was seamlessly transformed from traditional file-based formats into a modern structure and integrated into a blockchain transaction. Chainlink played a key role in routing the delivery of data and was responsible for transmitting the message to relevant blockchain networks. ### A Step Towards Modernizing Financial Infrastructure DTCC's Smart NAV pilot is indicative of a broader trend in the financial industry, where blockchain technology is being utilized to modernize existing infrastructure. The ability to seamlessly provide data on-chain opens up a wealth of opportunities for tokenized assets, smart contracts, and other blockchain applications. This pilot project serves as a proof of concept, demonstrating that trusted data can be effectively integrated into blockchain networks. It sets a precedent for future innovation in the industry and highlights the potential for continued collaboration between traditional financial institutions and emerging blockchain technology. The successful completion of the Smart NAV pilot represents a significant achievement for DTCC, Chainlink, and the entire financial services sector. The integration of blockchain technology into key processes like data transmission and validation has the potential to revolutionize the way financial institutions operate. As the industry continues to evolve, initiatives like the Smart NAV pilot will play a crucial role in shaping the future of finance.

meta_value.__cdata: DTCC Successfully Implements Pilot Program for Sending Data to Chainlink

title.__cdata: Bitcoin's correlation with technology stocks reaches its highest level since August.

encoded.__cdata: Bitcoin Correlation with Tech Stocks on the Rise ### Bitcoin and Tech Stocks Bitcoin, the largest cryptocurrency, is now being compared to high-growth assets such as technology company shares, as optimism grows over a potential reduction in borrowing costs. During the Federal Reserve's last tightening cycle, Bitcoin was considered a speculative investment and slumped as higher interest rates were expected to reduce risk appetite. However, recent trading patterns show a different story. ### Correlation Coefficient The 90-day correlation coefficient between Bitcoin and the tech-heavy Nasdaq 100 index reached 0.46 this week, the highest level since late August. This suggests that the assets are moving more in sync, compared to earlier when the Fed started raising interest rates in early 2022. This correlation has drawn attention to Bitcoin as a growth asset or an asset representing network value. ### Bitcoin as an Uncorrelated Asset Bitcoin proponents have long promoted the coin as an uncorrelated asset, detached from governmental influences. Created in 2008 with the goal of being a decentralized currency outside the control of central banks, Bitcoin has been hailed as a digital alternative to gold, an inflation hedge, and a store of value. However, its price volatility has challenged these narratives over the years. ### Impact of US ETFs The approval of US exchange-traded funds holding Bitcoin has opened up the cryptocurrency to a new category of investors. Since the ETFs went live in January, Bitcoin surged to a record high of almost $74,000 in March. It has continued to rise, with a 10% increase this week and a 58% jump year-to-date, outpacing the Nasdaq 100. ### Future Outlook and Fed's Influence As the Fed signals a potential reduction in borrowing costs, Bitcoin advocates anticipate a positive impact on risk assets, including cryptocurrencies. With inflation easing and Fed officials cautious about rate cuts, the macroeconomic landscape will play a significant role in shaping Bitcoin's trajectory. ### Uncertainty Ahead While Bitcoin has shown resilience and growth post-US ETFs, the potential impact of Fed rate cuts remains uncertain. Whether Bitcoin will continue to be viewed as a risky or alternative asset by traditional markets will be a key factor to watch in the coming months. In conclusion, Bitcoin's correlation with tech stocks highlights its evolving nature as an asset class, influenced by macroeconomic factors and investor sentiment in the broader market.

meta_value.__cdata: Bitcoin's correlation with technology stocks reaches its highest level since August.

title.__cdata: droppGroup Unveils droppLink to Transform AI Development with Tokenization

encoded.__cdata:
droppGroup Introduces Revolutionary AI Service Platform, droppLink

Redefining AI Development and Management

In a groundbreaking move, droppGroup has announced the launch of droppLink, a cutting-edge service platform that is set to transform artificial intelligence (AI) development and management across various blockchains. The platform's infrastructure simplifies computational demands, enables micropayments, and democratizes data contributions, giving users ownership and oversight. Computational Resource Patrons (CRPs) support infrastructure costs and share in the revenue generated by the AI processes they enable.

Empowering Users with Data Integrity

Gurps Rai, CEO and Co-Founder of droppGroup, highlighted the significance of droppLink in ensuring unparalleled data integrity and streamlining AI development. The platform tokenizes every action in an AI model's lifecycle on multiple blockchains, including Solana, Polygon, Ethereum, Base, and Hyperledger Fabric 2.5. This approach upholds data ownership rights and provides a transparent, immutable record of usage through Proof of Gen and Data Genesis protocols. Christopher J. Kelly, President and Co-Founder of droppGroup, emphasized the company's commitment to ethical and responsible AI development. He lauded droppLink for exemplifying this dedication and for bringing sophisticated multi-modal AI systems to the market. Kelly is scheduled to speak at the AWS Summit, where he will address data integrity in AI and the company's mission to prioritize ethical development practices.

Unlocking the Future of AI

Addressing Ethical Concerns in AI

As the AI sector continues to expand, ethical concerns surrounding data provenance, IP protection, and fair compensation for creators have become paramount. droppLink aims to tackle these issues by combining AI and blockchain technologies to establish an ethical management layer that has been lacking in the industry. The platform is currently accessible via droppPhygital and is operational on the platform, offering multi-chain integration, robust tokenization, and a focus on data integrity to reshape the AI landscape.

Leading the Way in Web3 Development

droppGroup is at the forefront of Web3 development, leveraging its innovative software solutions to shape the future. The company specializes in AI, machine learning, object recognition, streaming, AR, VR, MR, and crypto, providing clients with a range of technical, marketing, and operational services to enhance their communities and drive growth. With droppLink paving the way for ethical AI development, droppGroup is poised to lead the charge in transforming the industry with trust, transparency, and innovation.

title.__cdata: Bitcoin's price rises to $66K after positive ETF information

encoded.__cdata:
Bitcoin Reaches $66,000

Bitcoin (BTC) surged past $66,000 early Friday, rebounding from a pullback that saw it dip below $65,000 on Thursday. At the time of reporting, it was trading around $66,440, up 0.4% from 24 hours earlier. The CoinDesk 20 Index (CD20), which provides a broader view of the digital asset market, was up approximately 1.4%. There has been a resurgence in inflows into spot bitcoin ETFs, with four consecutive days of positive additions. Institutional players like Morgan Stanley have also disclosed significant investments in BTC ETFs, with Morgan Stanley revealing a $269.9 million stake in Grayscale's GBTC.

Ether Potential Upside

While Ether may have lagged other major digital assets this year, Coinbase suggests that it has the potential for a surprising upside. According to a research report, Ether does not face significant supply side pressures and benefits from staking and layer 2 growth as liquidity sinks. The coin's position in the DeFi ecosystem is strong due to widespread adoption of the EVM and layer 2 innovations. Coinbase also highlighted the potential impact of approved spot U.S. ETH ETFs.

Fantom's Rise

The Fantom blockchain's native token FTM has been one of the standout performers in the past week, gaining 13% to reach around 81 cents. This rise is attributed to positive sentiment around the Sonic upgrade and growth in total value locked on the protocol. Fantom Foundation's latest upgrade, Sonic, is expected to increase transaction speeds to 2,000 transactions per second with a 1.1-second finality, a significant improvement from the previous month's 2.5 TPS.

Bitcoin Hodler Net Position Change

The "hodler net position change" for Bitcoin, which measures the net buying/selling activity of addresses holding coins for six months or more, has turned positive for the first time since December. This shift indicates that long-term holders have become net buyers, signaling a positive sentiment in the market. The data is sourced from Glassnode.

meta_value.__cdata: Bitcoin's price rises to $66K after positive ETF information

title.__cdata: CryptoQuant CEO Sets Date for Bullish Conclusion in Bitcoin Trading

encoded.__cdata:
Bitcoin Reaches New All-Time High Before Halving

Bitcoin, the leading cryptocurrency, has recently hit a new all-time high (ATH) by surpassing its previous ATH of $69,000 before the halving in April. This increase in price has sparked bullish expectations among investors.

Market Correction Raises Concerns

However, following the new ATH, Bitcoin experienced significant corrections which led to speculation that the bear market had reemerged. Despite this, CryptoQuant CEO Ki Young Ju provided some reassurance to investors.

According to Ju, Bitcoin is currently in the middle of its bull market cycle. He pointed out that the current market value is growing at a faster rate than the realized market value, indicating that the bull run may continue until April 2025.

“Bitcoin is in the middle of its bull cycle. Market value grows faster than realized value, and this trend usually lasts for about two years. If this pattern continues, the bull cycle could end in April 2025.”

Bitcoin Trading at $66,390

As of the time of writing, Bitcoin is trading at $66,390. Despite the recent corrections, Ju's comments have provided some optimism to investors who believe that the bull market is still intact.

#Bitcoin is in the middle of the bull cycle. Its market cap is growing faster than its realized cap, a trend that typically lasts around two years. If this pattern continues, the bull cycle might end by April 2025. pic.twitter.com/o4k8B1Rkhv

— Ki Young Ju (@ki_young_ju) May 17, 2024

*Please note that this information is not intended as investment advice.

Overall, despite the recent market corrections, Bitcoin's performance has remained strong, and investors are hopeful that the bull market will continue for the foreseeable future.

meta_value.__cdata: CryptoQuant CEO Sets Date for Bullish Conclusion in Bitcoin Trading

title.__cdata: Bitcoin traders aim for $74K next week as BTC spot ETFs see four days of inflows.

Institutional Demand and Risk Appetite Could Send Bitcoin Soaring

Bitcoin Set to Break All-Time Highs

He predicts that a test of the $71,000 to $74,000 price range could happen as early as next week, potentially igniting a new wave of FOMO (fear of missing out) among investors.

The positive outlook for Bitcoin comes as U.S.-listed spot ETFs tracking the cryptocurrency recorded significant inflows, totaling $257 million by Thursday. CPI Data Impacting Market Movement

title.__cdata: Ex-Employee of Pump.fun Abuses Withdrawal Privileges, Resulting in $1.9M Loss

encoded.__cdata:
Former Employee Misappropriates $1.9 Million in SOL From Pump.fun

A Solana-based meme coin launchpad, Pump.fun, recently faced a setback when a former employee misused their position to access the withdraw authority and stole around 12,300 SOL, valued at approximately $1.9 million. To prevent further damage, Pump.fun took immediate action by halting trading and updating their contracts.

Flash Loan Exploit

Pump.fun revealed that the former employee exploited their privileged position by accessing the withdrawal authority they had obtained during their time with the company. Using flash loans on a Solana lending protocol, the individual borrowed SOL and manipulated coin prices to 100% on bonding curves, allowing them to access liquidity and repay the loans. Trading on the platform was halted soon after, impacting about $1.9 million out of $45 million in total liquidity. The team redeployed contracts and resumed trading with a 0% fee for the next seven days.

The affected tokens that reached 100% during the exploit are currently untradeable until liquidity pools are set up for them on the Solana lending protocol, Raydium. Pump.fun assured users that they would replenish the liquidity pools for the affected coins with an equal or greater amount of SOL within the next 24 hours to compensate for the loss.

Internal Private Key Leak

Prior to Pump.fun's announcement, Wintermute's head of research, Igor Igamberdiev, linked the hack to an internal private key leak and suspected a user named "STACCoverflow." Subsequently, user "Stacc" admitted to executing the exploit, citing dissatisfaction with their superiors at Pump.fun and criticizing them as unfit for the blockchain community.

The team at Pump.fun is working diligently to resume trading safely and has sought assistance from renowned security experts to prevent similar incidents in the future. Despite the setback, they remain committed to ensuring the security and integrity of their platform for all users.

meta_value.__cdata: Ex-Employee of Pump.fun Abuses Withdrawal Privileges, Resulting in $1.9M Loss

title.__cdata: Mintlayer and Salus Join Forces to Introduce L3 Thunder Network Based on ZK Technology

encoded.__cdata: # Mintlayer and Salus Partner to Launch Thunder Network for Bitcoin Scalability In a significant development for the blockchain industry, Mintlayer, a leading Layer-2 scaling solution, has joined forces with Salus, a security firm specializing in zero-knowledge (ZK) proofs, to introduce the Thunder Network. This cutting-edge Layer-3 ZK rollup-based network is designed to enhance Bitcoin’s scalability and functionality. ## Advancing Bitcoin's capabilities with Thunder Network The Thunder Network initiative is set to revolutionize Bitcoin by integrating advanced privacy features, improved transaction speeds, and greater scalability. This Layer-3 solution also brings Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) compatible functionalities, allowing developers to build secure and reliable applications on a Bitcoin-connected infrastructure with ease. As part of this integration, existing EVM dApps will be compatible, streamlining the process for developers to innovate on the Bitcoin network using the Mintlayer protocol. Mintlayer's Founder, Enrico Rubboli, expressed excitement about the partnership with Salus and the potential of the Thunder Network to enhance Bitcoin’s transaction speed, privacy, and functionality while empowering developers to create innovative applications. ## Building a future-proof Bitcoin network Salus, known for its expertise in privacy-enhancing technologies and its track record in the Ethereum ecosystem, was a natural partner for Mintlayer. The collaboration aims to redefine how developers and users interact with Bitcoin by leveraging Salus' ZK solutions and Mintlayer's scaling expertise to drive innovation and adoption while upholding security, privacy, and decentralization. The Thunder Network is strategically designed to address scalability challenges faced by the Mintlayer network and provide additional EVM functionality currently missing from the platform. This approach ensures that the network remains resilient, scalable, and capable of supporting diverse applications. ## Wrapping up The partnership between Mintlayer and Salus through the Thunder Network marks a significant milestone in the evolution of Bitcoin and its role in the broader blockchain ecosystem. By incorporating Layer-3 ZK rollups, the Thunder Network aims to offer a high-performance user experience without compromising Bitcoin's core principles of security, privacy, and decentralization.

meta_value.__cdata: Mintlayer and Salus Join Forces to Introduce L3 Thunder Network Based on ZK Technology

title.__cdata: Two Chinese nationals arrested in $73 million cryptocurrency scam in US

encoded.__cdata:
Chinese Nationals Charged in $73 Million Cryptocurrency Scam

Arrests and Charges

In a recent development, U.S. authorities have charged two Chinese nationals in a cryptocurrency scam that laundered at least $73 million from defrauded victims, according to the Justice Department. Yicheng Zhang was arrested in Los Angeles, while Daren Li, a dual citizen of China and St. Kitts and Nevis, was arrested at the Atlanta airport in April.

Allegations and Accusations

The U.S. has accused the two individuals of being involved in a type of cryptocurrency investment scam known as pig butchering, which has emerged as a billion-dollar industry worldwide. The defendants allegedly instructed co-conspirators to open U.S. bank accounts under the guise of shell companies.

Modus Operandi and Money Laundering

The victims were lured online into depositing their funds into these accounts, which were then used for money laundering through U.S. financial institutions to bank accounts located in the Bahamas. U.S. Deputy Attorney General Lisa Monaco highlighted the reach of the law in combating fraud in the crypto markets.

Charges and Potential Sentencing

Li and Zhang are facing charges of conspiracy to commit money laundering and six counts of international money laundering. If convicted, they could each face a maximum sentence of 20 years in prison for each count, as per the Justice Department. The crackdown on such fraudulent activities underscores the authorities' commitment to upholding the law in the emerging cryptocurrency landscape. The news of the Chinese nationals' involvement in the cryptocurrency scam serves as a reminder of the risks associated with digital investments and the importance of due diligence in vetting financial opportunities. As the case unfolds, the impact of such scams on unsuspecting investors and the broader financial system remains a topic of scrutiny and concern.

meta_value.__cdata: Two Chinese nationals arrested in $73 million cryptocurrency scam in US

title.__cdata: Is Bitcoin Poised to Reach a New All-Time High as it Surpasses $66K? (BTC Price Analysis)

encoded.__cdata:
Bitcoin Bulls Ready to Charge Towards a New Record High

After almost two months of correction, Bitcoin's price is finally showing signs of bullish momentum. The bulls are now gearing up to possibly set a new record high in the coming weeks, but the question remains - will they succeed?

Technical Analysis by TradingRage

The Daily Chart

Bitcoin's daily price action has been exhibiting a corrective behavior, with lower highs and lows since the drop from $75K. The market was in a corrective phase within a descending channel rather than a full bearish reversal. However, the price has recently broken above the channel's midline and is heading towards testing the upper boundary. A bullish breakout above the descending channel could signal a rally to higher levels.

The 4-Hour Chart

On the 4-hour timeframe, the price has broken above the midline of the descending channel and retested it. Currently aiming for the $68K resistance level, a breakout above this point could lead to a rally towards the $75K all-time high. With the Relative Strength Index (RSI) above 50%, the bullish momentum is strong, making these targets achievable.

On-Chain Analysis by TradingRage

Bitcoin Exchange Reserve

During the recent price drop below $60K, many investors panicked and sold their coins to mitigate losses. This behavior is reflected in the exchange reserve chart, which showed a rise above the 30-day moving average as investors deposited coins to exchanges for selling. However, as the market climbed back above $60K, reserves dropped below the moving average, indicating investors withdrawing coins in anticipation of a longer price rally.

This trend could lead to a supply shock, reducing selling pressure and potentially driving Bitcoin's price higher towards a new record high.

meta_value.__cdata: Is Bitcoin Poised to Reach a New All-Time High as it Surpasses $66K? (BTC Price Analysis)

title.__cdata: Bitcoin surpasses $67,000 but underperforms broader crypto market with notable gains from ETH, SOL, and LINK.

encoded.__cdata:
The Return of Animal Spirits: Bitcoin Surges to $67,000

Bitcoin Breaks Through $67,000 Barrier

After nearly a month of stagnant prices, the price of bitcoin (BTC) has finally surged above the $67,000 mark. At the time of writing, bitcoin was trading at $67,250, marking a 2.8% increase over the past 24 hours and a 10% rise from its recent lows on Monday. This uptick in price was seen across the broader CoinDesk 20 Index, which recorded a 4.4% increase over the past 24 hours and a 12% rise from Monday's lows.

Chainlink Leads the Way

One of the standout performers in the cryptocurrency market was Chainlink (LINK), which saw an 18% increase following the announcement of a pilot project with the Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation (DTCC) and major U.S. financial institutions. Other top performers included ether (ETH) with a 5.3% gain and solana (SOL) with a 7.7% increase.

Sentiment Shifts in Crypto Market

The sudden surge in cryptocurrency prices comes on the back of recent economic data showing a softening in U.S. inflation. Additionally, regulatory filings revealed a significant interest in spot bitcoin ETFs, with Izzy Englander's Millennium Management disclosing a $2 billion position in BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT) and Paul Singer's Elliott Management also revealing substantial bitcoin ETF holdings. The State of Wisconsin Investment Board, responsible for managing the state's retirement assets, was also revealed to have a stake of approximately $100 million in BlackRock's IBIT. These developments have renewed confidence in the cryptocurrency market, leading to a bullish sentiment among investors. With the price of bitcoin breaking through the $67,000 barrier and other cryptocurrencies showing strong gains, the animal spirits in the cryptocurrency market have returned after a prolonged period of sideways movement. As investors keep a close eye on market developments and economic indicators, the future of the cryptocurrency market remains uncertain but filled with possibilities.

meta_value.__cdata: Bitcoin surpasses $67,000 but underperforms broader crypto market with notable gains from ETH, SOL, and LINK.

title.__cdata: Shiba Inu (SHIB), Pepe (PEPE), and a Memecoin Inspired by Trump Surpass Bitcoin's Performance This Week

encoded.__cdata: # Shiba Inu, Pepe, and Trump-Themed Memecoin Outpace Bitcoin This Week ## Memecoins Gain Momentum in 2024 The year 2024 has been dominated by the rise of memecoins in the cryptocurrency market. Numerous new tokens have emerged, with some showcasing impressive gains of thousands of percent. The buzz surrounding memecoins shows no signs of slowing down as these tokens continue their upward trajectory, surpassing the broader cryptocurrency market. ## Shiba Inu, Pepe, and MAGA Coin Outperform Bitcoin Notably, memecoins like Shiba Inu, Pepe, and MAGA Coin have surpassed Bitcoin in performance this past week. These memecoins, known for their meme-centric approach and minimal utility for investors, have garnered significant attention and buying activity. Shiba Inu, established in August 2020, has seen its price rise by over 7%, pushing its market cap above $14 billion. Pepe, a token based on the iconic Pepe meme, has climbed to the top 25 tokens by market cap, with a total value exceeding $4 billion and a price increase of over 17% this week. MAGA Coin, launched in August 2023, has surged by nearly 70% in 2024. ## Bitcoin's Performance and Market Trends While memecoins take the spotlight, Bitcoin also experienced growth this week. Positive news surrounding inflation and comments from former President Donald Trump regarding cryptocurrency adoption contributed to Bitcoin's price surge from $60,000 to over $66,000, marking a 6% increase. Despite Bitcoin's performance, memecoins have collectively outperformed the leading cryptocurrency. The S&P 500 and Nasdaq 100, in comparison, saw modest gains of around 2% to 2.5% this week. ## Conclusion As memecoins continue to attract investors and fuel market excitement, their outperformance against Bitcoin highlights the ongoing trend in the crypto space. While the broader market remains volatile, memecoins like Shiba Inu, Pepe, and MAGA Coin demonstrate the influence of memes and community-driven narratives in shaping the cryptocurrency landscape in 2024.

title.__cdata: MetaLend Launches Cross-Chain Cryptocurrency Trading on Ronin Network

encoded.__cdata:
MetaLend Launches Cross-Chain Trading on the Ronin Ecosystem

In a recent press release from New York, USA on May 17th, 2024, MetaLend, a crypto trading platform for Web3 gaming assets, announced its latest update: cross-chain trading on the Ronin ecosystem. This new feature allows users to trade gaming assets on Ethereum, Polygon, and the Binance Smart Chain.

The Gateway to Crypto Investment

With MetaLend's expansion to cross-chain trading, they are tapping into the growing trend of gamers transitioning into crypto trading. The platform's mission to merge Web3 gaming with crypto investing has been further solidified with this innovative update. Gaming has emerged as a popular entry point to the world of crypto investing, with many active wallets being used for gaming purposes. MetaLend's platform acts as a gateway for newcomers looking to explore and venture into crypto trading.

Opening Doors for the Ronin Community and Crypto Investors

The expansion of MetaLend's platform presents exciting opportunities for the Ronin Community and crypto investors alike. The growing interest in crypto gaming in 2024 and beyond has positioned MetaLend's cross-chain trading as a unique opportunity to capitalize on this emerging market. This expansion allows users to trade gaming assets for popular cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, enhancing liquidity and broadening investment horizons within a specialized trading environment.

Welcoming Collaborators

MetaLend's platform also caters to B2B gaming collaborations, offering flexible token listing capabilities for developers and gaming platforms. This creates new opportunities for partnerships and connections within the gaming ecosystem. By allowing developers to showcase their unique tokens, MetaLend promotes diversity and expands the range of in-game assets available to users.

About Ronin

Ronin is an EVM-compatible blockchain designed specifically for gaming. Developed by the creators of Axie Infinity, Sky Mavis, Ronin has successfully scaled a single game to accommodate millions of daily active users.

About MetaLend

Founded by Sudjeev Singh and Nikhil Bhardwaj, MetaLend is a specialized trading platform for gamers, offering innovative solutions for trading, earning, and borrowing against gaming tokens and NFTs. With a trusted reputation in the crypto gaming landscape and backed by investors like Pantera Capital and Collab+Currency, MetaLend continues to bridge the gap between gaming and crypto trading with its cutting-edge solutions.

For more information, users can visit the MetaLend website and follow the platform's social media channels for the latest updates. This Press Release serves as informational content and does not constitute investment advice or an offer to invest.

By integrating AirDAO into its ecosystem, Prom aims to enhance the scalability of next-generation Web3 products, allowing for more efficient and scalable solutions to serve a growing number of users and transactions.

The collaboration between Prom and AirDAO has been well-received by the community, with DWF Labs expressing their appreciation for the impactful collaboration. This partnership signifies a joint mission to drive a decentralized future, empowering users and ensuring transparency in digital asset management.

Prom and AirDAO Collaboration Set to Redefine Web3 Landscape

AirDAO operates on a decentralized autonomous organization model, enabling collective decision-making within the community. By leveraging AirDAO's innovative blockchain technology and governance model, Prom aims to improve its current solutions and pave the way for exceptional projects in the Web3 future. This collaboration is expected to introduce game-changing innovations in the Web3 sector, offering users more dynamic and adaptable solutions.

In conclusion, the integration of AirDAO into the Prom Ecosystem represents a significant step towards decentralization, transparency, and user-friendly experiences in the Web3 landscape. The future looks bright for Web3, thanks to the partnership between AirDAO and Prom.

title.__cdata: Bitcoin's Daily Gains Reach Highest Levels in 2 Months, Jack Dorsey Predicts Price Will Exceed $1 Million

encoded.__cdata:
Bitcoin Shows Highest Daily Gains In 2 Months, Jack Dorsey Predicts Price Will Surpass $1 Million

Jack Dorsey's Shifting Focus

Former Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey, known for leading X (formerly Twitter) from 2015 to 2021, has now turned his attention to the world of cryptocurrency. He has co-founded Block, Inc. (formerly Square) and served on the board of directors for Bluesky, a decentralized social media platform. In a recent interview, Dorsey shared his thoughts on the future of Bitcoin.

Dorsey's Views on Decentralization

In the interview, Dorsey explained his decision to leave Bluesky's board and delete his profile on the platform. He criticized the "moderation tools" used by the company, stating that they were repeating mistakes made during his time at Twitter. He expressed disappointment that the company had shifted away from its original vision of decentralization and open-source protocols.

Dorsey's Bold Prediction for Bitcoin

When asked about where the price of Bitcoin could be in 2030, Dorsey made a bold prediction. He stated, "I don’t know. Over... at least a million." Dorsey believes that the price of Bitcoin will surpass $1 million and continue to rise beyond that. He emphasized the collaborative effort within the Bitcoin ecosystem, noting that every individual who contributes to its improvement ultimately drives up the price.

Market Implications

If Dorsey's prediction were to come true, it would represent a price increase of over 1,400% by 2030. This would result in a market capitalization of over $19.7 trillion, comparable to the total market cap of the Nasdaq 100 index. However, widespread adoption would be essential for such a significant price surge to occur.

Industry Reactions

Dorsey is not alone in his optimistic price prediction for Bitcoin. Other prominent figures in the crypto industry, such as ARK Invest CEO, have also put forth ambitious targets for the cryptocurrency. While not all investors may share Dorsey's confidence in Bitcoin reaching $1 million, his unique perspective as a developer brings an insightful view to the discussion. In conclusion, while Dorsey's $1 million price target for Bitcoin may seem far-fetched to some, it sparks intriguing conversations about the future of the cryptocurrency market. Regardless of the outcome, Dorsey's insights shed light on the transformative power of collaborative efforts within the crypto ecosystem. This narrative is based on an article published by Benzinga.com.

meta_value.__cdata: Bitcoin's Daily Gains Reach Highest Levels in 2 Months, Jack Dorsey Predicts Price Will Exceed $1 Million

title.__cdata: Senator Lummis Shows Bitcoin Laser Eyes Following Approval of Crypto Legislation

encoded.__cdata:
Senator Lummis Shows Support for Bitcoin Legislation

U.S. Senator Cynthia Lummis, known for her advocacy of Bitcoin, recently posted a tweet with the caption "Bitcoin laser eyes" on social media platform X. She believes that Bitcoin is a reliable store of value and a hedge against inflation.

Senator Lummis, who represents Wyoming and serves on the Senate Banking Committee, is actively pushing for laws that support the cryptocurrency market. She aims to create a regulatory framework that promotes innovation in the crypto space while ensuring consumer protection.

Legislation Passed to Overturn SEC Rule

The Senate passed legislation, known as H.J.Res. 109, that targets the overturning of the SEC's Staff Accounting Bulletin (SAB) No. 121. This rule places strict limitations on financial institutions, preventing them from offering custody services for digital assets like Bitcoin.

Senator Lummis has been a vocal advocate for overturning SAB 121, criticizing it as a rule disguised as accounting guidance that was implemented without full commission approval.

Concerns Raised Over DOJ Interpretation of Regulations

Recently, Senator Lummis and Senator Ron Wyden wrote a letter to U.S. Attorney General Merrick Garland expressing concerns about the Department of Justice's interpretation of regulations related to "money transmission." They argued that this interpretation could have negative implications for crypto networks and innovation in the financial sector.

White House Opposes Legislation

Despite the Senate's approval of H.J.Res. 109, the White House has expressed opposition to the legislation. President Biden has stated that he would veto the bill if it reaches his desk. The White House believes that overturning SAB 121 could jeopardize investor protection in the crypto market and pose risks to the financial system.

Critics of SAB 121 argue that the rule is overly restrictive and hinders financial institutions from meeting the growing demand for cryptocurrency services. They believe that these institutions have the necessary compliance frameworks and security measures to handle digital asset custody effectively.

Uncertain Future for Bitcoin Legislation

While the Senate has approved the legislation, its fate remains uncertain due to the potential presidential veto. President Biden has the option to veto the bill, sign it into law, or take no action, allowing it to become law without his signature. The outcome will determine the future of regulations surrounding financial institutions' custody of digital assets.

meta_value.__cdata: Senator Lummis Shows Bitcoin Laser Eyes Following Approval of Crypto Legislation

Chainlink Jumps 18% Following DTCC Announcement

The positive market sentiment in crypto is further supported by regulatory filings showing growing interest in bitcoin ETFs and a softening in U.S. economic data.
